ESP.ORIGINAL:
It has not been easy filling the shoes of the most beloved Overseer in the history of this vault. I can only hope that Mr. Alan Breech can see that I am doing my best.
The transition has been going smoothly so far. But then again that's not by my doing, rather the legacy of the one and only Breech. It is going to be a tough period living under his shadow.
R&D has made progress. The new and improved police force has been excellent in handling any and all problems that have arisen. We have had zero incidents this quarter, which means that we have reached an all time low in terms of crime rate. Residents have been reporting feelings of uneasiness around the new security however. I have resorted to printing new posters that will, hopefully, adress the issue.
Remember: Reach out to Doctor Howard again for renewed prescription.
ESP.TRADUIT:
接替这个避难所历史上最受爱戴的监督对我来说并不容易。我只希望艾伦·布雷奇先生能看到我已经尽力了。
到目前为止，交接工作进展顺利。但话又说回来，这不是我的功劳，而是独一无二的布雷奇的遗产。在他的阴影下生活将是一段艰难的时期。
研发取得了进展，经过改进的新警察部队在处理任何和所有出现的问题方面都表现出色。本季度我们没有发生任何事故，这意味着我们的犯罪率达到了历史最低水平。然而，居民们一直在报告对新的安全措施感到不安。我已经开始印刷新的海报，希望能解决这个问题。
记住：再次联系霍华德医生以获得新的处方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have heard complaints that the water has been tasting funny lately. I can attest to that myself, but there was no test scheduled for today, and Professor Taylor has assured me that it's due to the improvements to the filtration systems and that there will be a period of habituation. I will have to increase production of soft drinks as a distraction in the short term.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到有人抱怨说今天的水尝起来怪怪的。我可以证明这一点，但今天并没有安排测试，泰勒教授向我保证，这是由于过滤系统的改进而造成的而且还需要一段时间来适应。在短期内，我将不得不增加软饮料的产量，以分散注意力。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient #006 has been a difficult case. Acute Myeloid Leukemia, a very rare condition, especially considering the patient's age. Previous episode of Myelodysplastic Syndrome makes treatment even more difficult. By my prognoisis the patient have only months left. I have informed the parent. I adviced him to seek therapy at Dr. Braum's clinic and have contacted them personally regarding his immediate bypassing of the usual cue system due to the acuteness of the disease of his child.
ESP.TRADUIT: 006号病人是个难缠的病例，急性髓系白血病，一种非常罕见的疾病，特别是考虑到患者的年龄，以前的骨髓增生异常综合征使治疗更加困难。根据我的预测，病人只剩下几个月的时间了。我已经通知家长了，我建议他去布劳姆医生的诊所寻求治疗，并亲自联系了他们，因为他的孩子的疾病非常严重，所以他立即绕过了通常的提示系统。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
If you are reading this, emergency Vault internment procedures have been initiated and you and your control group have been sealed into your Vault. Congratulations! You are now a vital part of the most ambitious program ever undertaken by Vault-Tec.
If you have not yet read your sealed orders, do so now. They will outline the experimental protocols assigned to your control group. Please remember that deviation from these protocols in any way will jeopardize the success of the program, and may be considered grounds for termination by Vault-Tec Corporation (as outlined in your Employment Agreement).
Your Vault may or may not have been selected to receive a G.E.C.K. module. Please see Attachment A for details.
Doctor Stanislaus Braun Director, Societal Preservation Program Vault-Tec Corporation
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果你正在读这篇文章，避难所的紧急收容程序已经启动，你和你的对照组已经被密封在你们的避难所里。恭喜你！你现在是避难所科技有史以来最雄心勃勃的项目的重要组成部分。
如果你还没有读你的密封指令，现在就去读吧，它将概述分配给你们对照组的实验方案。请记住，无论以何种方式偏离这些协议，都将危及项目的成功，并可能被避难所科技公司视为终止合同的理由（如您的雇佣协议中所述）。
你的避难所可能被选中接收G.E.C.K.模块，也可能不会。详见附件A。
- 斯坦尼斯劳斯·布劳恩博士 社会保护计划主任 避难所科技公司

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault 26 will not receive a G.E.C.K. module, and should operate under the guidelines laid forth in the Overseer's sealed orders.
ESP.TRADUIT: 26号避难所不会接收G.E.C.K.模块，应该按照监督密封指令中规定的指导方针运作。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
The G.E.C.K. is, quite simply, the most advanced piece of technology ever developed by Vault-Tec -- a terraforming module capability of creating life from complete lifelessness.
After riding out the storm of nuclear Armageddon in a Vault-Tec patented vault, residents can then activate the G.E.C.K., and create a new Earthen paradise -- craters and dust will give way to rolling grasslands and sparkling clear water. Of course, due to time and monetary constraints, not every vault will be equipped with a G.E.C.K. module.
ESP.TRADUIT:
简单来说，G.E.C.K.是避难所科技开发的最先进的技术——一个能够从完全无生命的环境中创造生命的改造模块。
在避难所科技专利避难所里安然度过核末日风暴之后，居民就可以激活G.E.C.K，火山口和尘土将让位给起伏的草原和波光粼粼的清水。当然，由于时间和资金的限制，并不是每个避难所都会配备G.E.C.K.模块。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Timothy Robwell
His recent promotion to Head Mechanic has proven to be a solid choice. Meticulous and caring, he does his utmost to keep the old Reactors going. He tells me he gets the feeling Vault-Tec did not anticipate the Vault to survive for as long as it has. If only he had the security clearance required to know such details. Nevertheless he has surpassed the capacity that his impressive merits imply, and with flying colors. I am glad to have such a promising member of the mechanical staff.
ESP.TRADUIT:
蒂莫西·罗威尔
他最近被晋升为首席机械师，这被证明是一个可靠的选择。他一丝不苟，关怀备至，竭尽所能地让老旧的反应堆继续运转。他告诉我，他有一种感觉，避难所科技公司没有预料到避难所能维持这么久，如果他有必要的安全许可来了解这些细节就好了。然而，他已经超越了他那令人印象深刻的功绩所暗示的能力，而且表现出色。我很高兴机械部门有这样一位有前途的成员。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Abbadon Taylor
It's tragic that such a brilliant man would fall so far. He has evidentely not been coping well with his loss and it might be prudent to discharge him from all of his duties. The Science Team seems to have a sort of Messiah like reverence of him however and has been defending him at every turn when I've tried to address the issue. Lately I have been forced to shut him down at every board meeting and the situation is getting out of hand, what with the entire team on his side. I will not allow tests to be conducted on large sections of the Vault's population, save from by the substances directly outlined by Vault-Tec. No revisions to the list has ever been made during the entire history of this Vault and that will not change as long as I am the Overseer.
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿巴顿·泰勒
如此杰出的人竟堕落到如此地步，真是悲剧。很明显，他并没有很好地应对他的损失，也许将他从他的所有职责中解脱出来是明智的。然而，科学团队似乎对他有一种弥赛亚般的崇敬，每当我试图解决这个问题时，他们都在为他辩护。最近每次董事会会议我都被迫让他闭嘴，情况越来越失控，因为整个团队都站在他这边。除了避难所直接列出的要点外，我不允许对避难所的大部分人口进行测试。在这个避难所的整个历史中，名单从未被修改过，只要我还是监督，就不会改变。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins
He has risen up the ranks at an unprecedented rate, despite his young age. His extensive expertise makes him my go to man for every question I might have about the dealings of our Research Department, and his robotic knowledge has lead to impressive breakthroughs. The new automated police force has been keeping the entire Vault in line and has eased security's , and thereby my own, workload considerably
My understanding is that he is close with Taylor and has been doing his best to keep him in high spirits, a futile effort I'm afraid but I am personally glad to see his youthful enthusiasm in full swing.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯
尽管他还很年轻，但他以前所未有的速度晋升。他广博的专业知识使我在研究部门的每一个问题上都能找到他，他的机器人知识也带来了令人印象深刻的突破。新的自动化警力使整个避难所井然有序，减轻了安保人员的工作量，也减轻了我的工作量
我的理解是，他与泰勒关系密切，一直在尽最大努力让他保持高昂的精神状态，但我担心这是徒劳的努力，但我个人很高兴看到他年轻的热情充分发挥。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF
Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Sometimes I think there has to be something outside this place. I hope Cathrine made it out. The sounds of constant fighting is getting to me, there has to be something outside this place where people don't fight where people aren't as mean as they always have been.
I saw some kind of bug crawl on my bedroom wall this morning. I imagined that it had seen places as beautiful as the sun, as the flowers and as warm and inviting as the summer air just like in the movies. I imagined that it was free and it made me so angry. I crushed it with my thumb. I don't know why but I did. Being free is not a choice, not an engram, not an excuse, not a constant reminder that everyone else is a failure, not a
ESP.TRADUIT:
有时候我觉得在这个地方之外一定有什么东西，我希望凯瑟琳逃出去了。不断争吵的声音让我感到不安，在这个地方之外一定有什么东西让人们不再争吵，让人们不再像以前那样刻薄。
今天早上我看见某种虫子爬在我卧室的墙上，我想象它看到过像阳光一样美丽的地方，像花朵一样美丽的地方，像夏天的空气一样温暖诱人的地方，就像电影里一样。我想象它是自由的，这让我很生气，我用拇指把它捏碎了。我不知道为什么，但我就是这么做了。自由不是一种选择，不是一种印记，不是一个借口，不是一个不断提醒你其他人都是失败者，不是一个

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Maintenance ID #5466 - Pablo Rangel
What is going on down there? There has been no response over the intercom for hours now, and we've tried every single channel at this point. This is my last-ditch attempt at contact before descension. If anyone reads this please respond.
ESP.TRADUIT:
维修ID #5466 - 巴勃罗·兰格尔
下面发生了什么事？对讲机已经好几个小时没有回应了，我们已经试过了所有的频道。这是我下降前最后一次尝试联系。如果有人读到这篇文章，请回复。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Welcome!
If you are reading this then a Nuclear Event is underway and Vault-Tec Corporation internment protocols are in effect. Congratulations!
You have been assigned the prestigious role of designated Vault-Greeter.
Due to the nature of the events, we expect that you feel somewhat disconcerted. But chin-up valued Vault-Resident! The Vault-Tec Corporation is proud to be part of the protection and preservation of the human race, and without employees such as yourself our mission would be impossible. Take heart in the fact that you are contributing to the Vault-Tec Corporation achieving their goals, aswell as to the survival of generations to come.
Your orders as Vault-Greeter are to greet every resident, check off their name off of the list and inform them of their predetermined Vault-Resident ID, outlined in the attachments labeled: Population Records A-, B- and C-26. Remember, whilst on duty, Vault-Tec employees are expected to always smile. Don't forget that YOU represent the entire company. So: Do Like Vault-Boy and Smile!
The recommended number of occupants to utilize the lift at the same time is 100. Please adhere to these limitations to ensure the safety of every Vault-Resident.
ESP.TRADUIT:
欢迎！
如果你正在阅读这篇文章，那么一场核事件正在进行中，避难所公司的拘留协议正在生效。恭喜你！
你被指派了一个尊贵的角色，避难所迎宾员。
由于事件的性质，我们预计你们会感到有些不安。但有价值的避难所居民！避难所科技公司很自豪能成为保护和保存人类的一部分，如果没有像你这样的员工，我们的使命就不可能完成。振作起来，你正在为避难所科技实现他们的目标做出贡献，也为子孙后代的生存做出贡献。
作为避难所迎宾员，你的任务是问候每一位居民，在名单上划掉他们的名字，并告知他们预定的避难所居民ID，在附件中标注：人口记录A-， B-和C-26。记住，在工作的时候，避难所科技的员工要保持微笑。别忘了你代表着整个公司。所以：像避难所小子一样微笑吧！
建议同时使用升降机的人数为100人。请遵守这些限制，以确保每个避难所居民的安全。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
4 cloves garlic, sliced
1 large pinch kosher salt
1 cup chopped raw walnuts
1 cup chopped Italian parsley
Juice from one lemon
2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil
Water if needed
ESP.TRADUIT:
- 4瓣大蒜，切片
- 1大撮粗盐
- 1杯切碎的生核桃
- 1杯切碎的意大利欧芹
- 1个柠檬的汁
- 2汤匙特级初榨橄榄油
- 水（如果需要）

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
My head is hurting and pounding. I can hear the walls talking to me. I don't like this place I don't like it at all. Something is making my eyeballs feel numb.
I'm going to my favorite cafe to clear my head and take a load off. They always knew how to make sweetrolls over Kelly's near my quarters, the ones they make here taste like dirt.
ESP.TRADUIT:
我的头又痛又重。我能听到墙壁跟我说话。我不喜欢这个地方，一点也不喜欢。有什么东西让我的眼球麻木了。
我需要去我最喜欢的咖啡馆清醒一下头脑，放松一下。我住的地方附近的凯利餐厅，他们总是知道怎么做甜面包，他们这里做的甜面包吃起来像土一样。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
It's getting hard to think straight. What have they done. Panic rising, we've lost all. And no sweetroll.
They will pay, after I relax one second, no one will judge me now. it doesn't matter. I knew he couldn't stand the pressure. Noone would've been able to. Why did I let him stay in charge why did I let him stay in charge
ESP.TRADUIT:
我越来越想不清楚了。他们做了什么？恐慌加剧，我们失去了一切。 也没有甜面包卷。
他们会付出代价的，等我放松一秒钟，就没人会对我指手画脚了。没关系的，我知道他承受不了压力，没人能做到。为什么我要让他继续负责为什么我要让他继续负责

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Amy - We've run into some problems here at the mine, I don't think I can make it home this year either. I'm sorry my love, I will be knocking on your door when you least expect it. Kiss the children for me. Yours forever,
Tempeh
ESP.TRADUIT:
艾米 - 我们在矿上遇到了一些问题，我想我今年也回不了家了。对不起，亲爱的，我会在你最意想不到的时候敲响你的门。替我亲亲孩子们。永远属于你的，
- 丹贝

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient #173 has had trouble with abdominal pains, the severity of which renders the patient unable to rest. I have performed a successful operation to remove the abdominal part of the torso without complications. The patient has been able to rest again and is very thankful.
ESP.TRADUIT: 患者#173有腹痛的毛病，其严重程度使病人无法休息。我已经成功地完成了切除躯干腹部部分的手术，没有出现任何并发症。病人又能休息了，他非常感激。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
We've done it. I knew it never could be like it once was. I hoped for a while, but now it's all gone and I see no other way out from this.
They're all mad, they're all gone. These stupid fucking eggheaded bastards never know when to stop. These stupid fucking tests became our downfall and for what? A company that probably doesn't even exist?
Every last sector has been plunged into chaos and Collins never even
ESP.TRADUIT:
我们完了。我就知道再也不可能像以前那样了。我只是希望了一段时间，但现在一切都过去了，我看不到其他出路。
他们都疯了，他们都死了。这些愚蠢的杂种书呆子永远不知道什么时候该停下来。这些该死的测试导致了我们的失败，为了什么？一家可能根本不存在的公司？
每一个区域都陷入了混乱，柯林斯甚至没有

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**HIGHLY CLASSIFIED INFORMATION -- UNAUTHORIZED ACCESS IS A CLASS 5 FELONY**
Welcome!
Welcome to the position of Overseer of Vault 26. You have chosen or been chosen to represent our Corporation in one of our Vault-Tec patented Vaults. Congratulations! The information present herewithin are confidential and any and all information contained within, or made in reference to, this document, are not to be divulged to any unauthorized personnel. Any such divulgences may result in the offender being subject to legal consequences consisting of up to, but not limited to, the death penalty.
It is your responsibility to periodically review these Orders to stay informed of any updates. You will be subject to, and will be deemed to have been made aware of and to have accepted, the changes in any revised Orders here presented by Vault-Tec by your continued use of this terminal after the date such revised Orders are posted, and should you be forced to, or voluntarily, leave the position granting you the privileges of access to information herewithin presented, you are to be expected to inform the succeeding party of any such updates to previously presented Orders before secession.
----
Under the present circumstances the mission of this Vault (26) - and thereby your responsibility as Overseer to ensure the continued success of - is to allow substances, presented and clarified below under the section labeled BA-88, to be distributed on set dates throughout the Water Supply utilized by the Vault itself. The amount of each substance listed under Section BA-88 is to be determined, under collegial scrutiny, by the approved and authorized Science Committee responsible for such measurements. If any negative and/or harmful effects are to be observed, such tests are to immediately sieze temporarily and the substance(s) considered responsible for previously mentioned negative effects are to be revised, and/or, replaced by the Science Committee, until such a time when and if continued distribution of the substance(s) in question, or its (their) replacement, is considered possible and ethical to conduct. Any and all changes, revisions, addages, replacements, measurements and distributions of any of the substances outlined in Section BA-88 are to be approved by The Appointed Science Committee as well as directly by The Overseer. Such approvals are to be submitted in writing under collegial scrutiny to ensure that no bias, threats or temporary lapses of judgement affect the mission as outlined herewithin by the Vault-Tec Corporation.
As an addendum to the mission previously laid out, your Vault (26) has been chosen as the location for the production and advancement of Vault-Tec's very own line of Robotic Security Models, based off of the PDQ-88b Securitron, RobCo Industries security model 2060-B, whose design has recently been procured from Robert E. House. These models, henceforth labeled as "Vault-Tec Securitrons" are to be developed and refined and when deemed appropriate, used as the main Security Force within the Vault. The Vault-Tec Securitrons will be used to carry out effective and expeditious scouting missions above ground when and if such efforts are collaboratively deemed possible and beneficial to the overaching mission of the Vault-Tec Corporation by the Science Committee and the Overseer.
----
Section BA-88
- Folic Acid (C-19-H-19-N-7-O-6) - Thiamine (C-12-H-17-N-4-O-S+) - Riboflavin (C-17-H-20-N-4-O-6) - Carbon (C) - Pantothenic Acid (C-9-H-17-N-O-5) - Phylloquinones (C-31-H-46-O-2) - L-Arabinose (C-5-H-10-O-5) - Threonine (C-4-H-9-N-O-3) - Biotin (C-10-H-16-N-2-O-3-S) - Pyridoxine (C-8-H-11-N-O-3) - L-Xylulose (C-5-H-10-O-5) - Flavin Adenine Dinucleotide (C-27-H-33-N-9-O-15-P-2) - Isoleucine (C-6-H-13-N-O-2) - Cyanocobalamin (C-63-H-88-Co-N-14-O-14-P) - L-Ribulose (C-5-H-10-O-5) - Cholecalciferol (C-27-H-44-O) - Molybdenum (Mo) - Selenium (Se) - Histidine (C-6-H-9-N-3-O-2) - Lysine (C-6-H-14-N-2-O-2) - Valine (C-5-H-11-N-O-2) - D-Erythrulose (C-4-H-8-O-4) - Caffeine (C-8-H-10-N-4-O-2) - Sodium (Na) - Amylum (C-6-H-10-O-5) - Adenine (C-5-H-5-N-5) - Cytosine (C-4-H-5-N-3-O) - D-Deoxyribose (C-5-H-10-O-4) - L-Deoxyribose (C-5-H-10-O-4) - Fructoselysine (C-12-H-24-N-2-O-7)
During revision, substances might be erased from, and/or added to the list presented above. Keep yourself updated to ensure that protocols are followed directly as outlined by the Vault-Tec Corporation.
ESP.TRADUIT:
**高度机密信息——未经授权访问是5级重罪**
欢迎！
欢迎来到26号避难所的监督岗位。您已经选择或被选择在我们的避难所科技专利避难所之一代表我们公司。恭喜你！
本文件中所包含的信息是保密的，本文件中所包含的或与本文件相关的任何和所有信息都不会泄露给任何未经授权的人员。任何此类泄露都可能导致犯罪人受到至多但不限于死刑的法律后果。
您有责任定期审查这些订单，以了解任何更新。在避难所科技提交的任何修订订单发布日期后，如果您继续使用本终端，您将受到该等修订订单的更改的影响，并将被视为已知悉并已接受该等修订订单的更改，并且如果您被迫或自愿离开授予您访问本协议中信息的特权的职位，贵方应在分离前通知继任方对先前提交的订单的任何此类更新。
----
在目前的情况下，这个避难所(26)的任务——也就是你作为监督确保持续成功的责任——是允许物质在规定的日期在避难所本身使用的供水系统中分发，这些物质在下面标有BA-88的部分中进行了介绍和澄清。BA-88中列出的每种物质的数量将由负责此类测量的经批准和授权的科学委员会在合议审查下确定。如果观察到任何负面和/或有害影响，则应立即进行此类试验，并对被认为对上述负面影响负有责任的物质进行修订，和/或由科学委员会取代，直至认为有可能和合乎道德地继续分配有关物质或其替代物质为止。对BA-88节中列出的任何物质的任何更改、修订、添加、替换、测量和分配均须由指定的科学委员会批准，也须由监督直接批准。此类批准应在合议审查下以书面形式提交，以确保避难所科技公司在本文中概述的任务不受偏见、威胁或暂时判断失误的影响。
作为之前制定的任务的补充，您的避难所(26)已被选为避难所科技自己的机器人安全模型系列的生产和发展的地点，基于PDQ-88b电子保安， RobCo工业安全模型2060-B，其设计最近已从罗伯特·埃德温·豪斯处采购。这些被称为“避难所科技电子保安”的模型将被开发和改进，并在适当时作为避难所内部的主要安全力量。如果科学委员会和监督员认为这种努力是可能的，并且有利于避难所科技的总体任务，那么避难所科技电子保安将用于执行有效和迅速的地面侦察任务。
----
BA-88部分
- 叶酸（C-19-H-19-N-7-O-6） - 硫胺素（C-12-H-17-N-4-O-S+） - 核黄素（C-17-H-20-N-4-O-6） - 碳(C) - 泛酸（C-9-H-17-N-O-5） - 叶绿醌（C-31-H-46-O-2） - 阿拉伯糖（C-5-H-10-O-5） - 苏氨酸（C-4-H-9-N-O-3） - 生物素（C-10-H-16-N-2-O-3-S） - 吡哆醇（C-8-H-11-N-O-3） - 木酮糖（C-5-H-10-O-5） - 黄素腺嘌呤二核苷酸（C-27-H-33-N-9-O-15-P-2） - 异亮氨酸（C-6-H-13-N-O-2） - 氰钴胺（C-63-H-88-Co-N-14-O-14-P） - 核酮糖（C-5-H-10-O-5） - 胆钙化醇（C-27-H-44-O） - 钼（Mo） - 硒（Se） - 组氨酸（C-6-H-9-N-3-O-2） - 赖氨酸（C-6-H-14-N-2-O-2） - 缬氨酸（C-5-H-11-N-O-2） - 赤藓酮糖（C-4-H-8-O-4） - 咖啡因（C-8-H-10-N-4-O-2） - 钠（Na） - 淀粉（C-6-H-10-O-5） - 腺嘌呤（C-5-H-5-N-5） - 胞嘧啶（C-4-H-5-N-3-O） - D-脱氧核糖（C-5-H-10-O-4） - L-脱氧核糖（C-5-H-10-O-4） - 果糖赖氨酸（C-12-H-24-N-2-O-7）
在修订期间，物质可能会从上述清单中删除，和/或增加。随时更新自己的信息，确保协议完全按照避难所科技的规定执行。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
I do not know what to say. Sudden Leukemia he said. She has always been pretty weak the poor girl and this is not something that she will survive. He knows it too but still he's here working late nights. And so secretive too, whenever I try to ask him about his work he changes the subject. I've been trying to get him to understand that he needs to be with Juni, now more than ever but he's not listening.
I went with her to Kelly's and we had a sweetroll together, mentioned that she misses her dad. It is such a terrible thing, she really is the sweetest girl. Father Amrick says He has a plan for us all but I just can't take comfort in that. I can't see how such a plan can be anything but the work of the devil himself.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
我不知道该说什么。“突发性白血病，”他说。她一直都很虚弱，可怜的女孩，这是她熬不过的。他也知道，但他还是在这里工作到深夜。而且很神秘，每当我想问他的工作时，他就会转移话题。我一直想让他明白他需要和朱妮在一起，现在比以往任何时候都重要但他就是不听。
我和她去了凯莉家，我们一起吃了一顿甜食，还提到她想她爸爸。这是一件多么可怕的事情，她真的是世界上最可爱的女孩。阿姆里克神父说他为我们所有人都制定了一个计划，但我无法从中得到安慰。我看不出这样的计划除了是魔鬼的杰作之外还有什么别的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hi again Tray.
So what you're saying is Vault-Tec made deals with that House guy? I guess they wanted to get in on some of that blood money too. I'm not sure about your theory, would they even be able to reverse engineer those things and then out-produce him? But I guess the plan worked, in a way. The surface is nothing but a giant radioactive desert now, and House is nothing but bones so there's no competition anymore.
What do you think Collins wants to do with them? I just don't get it, does he want to repopulate the world with the fuckers or what?
You know he declined my beer offer? The man is like a robot himself. Cold and dead inside, and at such a young age. I guess that kind of behavior comes with intelligence, right Tray?
Regards James
ESP.TRADUIT:
再次问好，特雷。
所以你的意思是避难所科技和那个豪斯做了交易？我猜他们也想从中分一杯羹。但你的理论是，他们想逆向工程这些东西，然后超越他？嗯，我想这个计划奏效了。地表现在只是一片巨大的放射性沙漠，豪斯也只是一堆骨头，所以...不再有竞争了。
但是柯林斯想用它们做什么呢？我就是不明白，他是想让那些混蛋重新充斥这个世界还是怎样？
你知道他拒绝了我的啤酒邀请吗？这个人自己就像一个机器人，年纪轻轻就内心冰冷，死气沉沉。我想这种行为是有智慧的，对吧，特雷？
此致 - 詹姆斯

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were locked in here so long. Brian couldn't take it anymore, started shooting. All gone, no way out with the terminal broken. Might as well
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们被关在这里太久了。布莱恩受不了了，开始开枪。都死了，终端坏了，没路可逃。还不如

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
Juni has left us. It was a beautiful sermon but Abbadon seemed unreachable, unconsolable and completely destroyed. Instead he's been hard at work getting his new formula to be approved by the board as if nothing has changed but the Overseer's still as clear as ever.
I remember a time when it felt almost as if we could read eachother's minds but now I have no idea what he's thinking half the time. Why is this new formula so important to him? How could something be more important than grieveing for his own daughter?
I will keep trying but for now I just can't seem to get through to him.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
朱妮离开了我们。这是一场美妙的布道，但阿巴顿却像隔绝在世界之外，任何慰藉都触不到他，整个人彻底垮了。相反，他一直在努力让他的新方案得到董事会的批准，就像什么都没有改变一样，但监督仍然像以前一样立场明确。
我记得有一段时间，我们几乎可以读懂对方的心思，但现在我有一半的时间都不知道他在想什么。为什么这个新配方对他如此重要？还有什么比为自己的女儿伤心更重要的事吗？
我会继续努力，但现在我似乎还是无法说服他。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
This place. This place. It is not what it used to be. Like all things it changed when I wanted it the least. At least my old friend is not here anymore to torment me.
But I need to keep trying. New combinations, new trials, new experiments. There has to be a way to get it all out, to be cured. There has to be, I won't let it all end like this. Everyone here is affected. I have no baseline, nothing to compare my findings to. Nothing.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
这个地方，这个地方，现在已经不是以前的样子了。就像所有事情一样，在我最不想要的时候，它改变了。至少我的老朋友不再来折磨我了。
但我需要继续努力，新的组合，新的尝试，新的实验。一定有办法把它都弄出来，治好它。一定会有的，我不会让一切就这样结束的。这里的每个人都受到了影响，我没有基线，没有任何东西可以用来比较我的发现。什么都没有。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
At last. This might be our last hope. One last try.
Let us not grow weary of doing good, for in due season we will reap, if we do not give up.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
终于，这可能是我们最后的希望了，最后一次尝试。
我们行善，不可丧志。若不放弃，到了时候，就必有收成。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
Vault-Tec and their strange ambitions has brought me one of if not the most interesting designs I have ever seen. The PDQ-88b is an extraordinary piece of technology, I can only be envious of House's genius. I have in line with standing orders from Vault-Tec managed to recreate them from the aquired blueprints. With integrated fusion motor RDR-Q76 I think that they will be able to reach new unprecedented speeds, which will undoubtedly help them in their outlined scouting missions. If Vault-Tec were still around I think that even they would be proud.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
避难所科技和他们奇怪的野心给我带来了我所见过的最有趣的设计之一。PDQ-88b是一项非凡的技术，我只能羡慕豪斯的天才。我遵照避难所科技的指令，根据获得的图纸重新制作了它们。有了集成的融合电机RDR-Q76，我认为他们将能够达到新的前所未有的速度，这无疑将帮助他们在既定的侦察任务上。如果避难所科技还在，我想他们也会感到骄傲的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
Elisa as my subject calls herself is nothing short of a miracle. It remains to see if this endeavor will yeild any tangible results but I do have high hopes, I do. I do. At least I have a baseline, my baseline that I do need. All the others were wasted on. If nothing works I will have to resort to other means, and I still have the back up. Yes. I'm close now. I can feel it. This is the first sign of any real hope we've had for years. And I can not let it go to waste. I do not want to let it go to waste. It would be a shame if it were to go to waste. Yes.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
避难所科技和他们奇怪的野心给我带来了我所见过的最有趣的设计之一。PDQ-88b是一项非凡的技术，我只能羡慕豪斯的天才。我遵照避难所科技的指令，根据获得的图纸重新制作了它们。有了集成的融合电机RDR-Q76，我认为他们将能够达到新的前所未有的速度，这无疑将帮助他们在既定的侦察任务上。如果避难所科技还在，我想他们也会感到骄傲的。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ansel Collins. Research ID #954A
Five years ago I'd never even imagine that one day I'd have my very own seat in the Science Committee. Yet here I am, in charge of the most talented people in this entire Vault. Everyone has been so very welcoming too, and all of my collegues are just as if not even more brilliant than I imagined. Especially my fellow Committee member I see everyday from my window. Abaddon has to be the closest thing to a real friend I have down here, and I think he feels the same.
As a side note, I have to come up with something to give his daughter for her upcoming birthday. I'm glad that his sister occasionally visit her, I can't imagine how difficult it must be to grow up without your mother around. I will have to try to remind him not to work too much.
ESP.TRADUIT:
安塞尔·柯林斯。研究ID #954A
五年前，我从未想过有一天我会在科学委员会拥有自己的席位。但我却在这里，管理着整个避难所里最有才华的人。每个人都很热情，我所有的同事都比我想象的更聪明。尤其是我每天从窗口看到的委员会成员。阿巴顿是我在这里最接近真正朋友的人了，我想他也有同样的感觉。
顺便说一句，我得想点东西送给他女儿，作为她即将到来的生日礼物。我很高兴他的妹妹偶尔会去看望她，我无法想象在没有母亲的情况下长大是多么困难。我得设法提醒他不要工作太多。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey again, sweetie. Haha, I can't promise anything!
That might be a good idea, I'm all for it. I'm sure we're not the only ones feeling this way.
You know, yesterday I saw him in the restrooms, just staring into the mirror. He didn't even notice me talking to him. I think I heard him say her name under his breath, like she was in the room with us. Honestly it made me feel a bit uneasy.
See you soon Jane. Love you!
Beccy
ESP.TRADUIT:
又来了，亲爱的。哈哈，我什么都不能保证！
这可能是个好主意，我完全赞成。我敢肯定我们不是唯一有这种感觉的人。
你知道吗，昨天我看到他在洗手间，盯着镜子，他甚至都没注意到我在跟他说话。我好像听到他在低声念她的名字，好像她就在房间里一样。老实说，这让我感到有点不安。
再见，简。爱你！
- 贝茜

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Abbadon Taylor. Research ID #217G
I have finally found some semblance of a kindred soul down here. Not like all these sycophants that surround me he actually speaks his mind, and it is refreshing. I think Monica would've liked him too.
The team I have gathered are competent enough, what they lack for in ingenuity they make up for in dedication to whatever inane project I present to them.
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿巴顿·泰勒。研究ID #217G
我终于在这里找到了志同道合的人。不像我周围的那些马屁精，他真的说出了自己的想法，这让人耳目一新。我觉得莫妮卡也会喜欢他的。
我组建的团队足够有能力，虽然他们的创造力不足，但他们会在我提交给他们的任何愚蠢的项目中弥补。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Abbadon Taylor. Research ID #217G
I have to admit, I am still unsure if you really wanted me to do this. But I can't have lost you for something and never have it see the light of day. I lost so much time with you. Maybe if this is a success it will all be worth it. Maybe in the end you will understand why I had to stay at work so late. Why you had to stay with aunt Mary so many evenings.
This has to be a success. They have to test it. I will make sure of it. Then you will be proud of me Juni.
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿巴顿·泰勒。研究ID #217G
我得承认，我还是不确定你是不是真的想让我这么做，但我不能因为什么失去你却让它永远不见天日，我在你身上浪费了太多时间。如果这次成功了，一切都是值得的。也许到最后你会明白我为什么要加班到这么晚，为什么你要和玛丽阿姨呆那么多晚上。
这一定会成功的，他们必须进行测试，我会保证的。那你会为我感到骄傲的，朱妮。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
**Safety notice To all personnel posted in the Laboratory in Section D5**
The Automatic Vault-Tec Safety Turrets installed in the Main Server Room require a ALPHA LEVEL SECURITY KEY CARD to be activated from the Mainframe. WARNING: Any personnel present in the Main Server Room NOT carrying a ZETA CLEARENCE KEY CARD on their person will be considered HOSTILE by the system if the turrets were to be activated! Remember to always keep your ZETA CLEARENCE KEY CARD readily visible for easy identification by the automated Vault-Scan Systems.
ESP.TRADUIT:
**给D5区实验室所有人员的安全通知**
安装在主服务器室的避难所科技自动安全炮塔需要从主机激活阿尔法层的安全密钥卡。警告：如果炮塔被激活，任何在主服务器室没有随身携带泽塔间密钥卡的人员将被系统视为敌对人员！记住，始终保持您的泽塔间密钥卡随时可见，以便于避难所科技自动扫描系统识别。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Patient #036 has expressed concerns regarding their deteriorating mental and physical health. My preliminary check-ups have discovered unnaturally high growth in muscle mass and endurance, and the patient claims they've never undertaken steps towards such a goal, such as through physical exercise.
In a trial of fractional flow reserve versus IVUS to guide PCI, the use of FFR resulted in fewer coronary anomalies. This might indicate an intake of hormonal amplifiers, though this is disputed by the patient. I've prescribed antidepressants and rest, along with continued check-ups.
ESP.TRADUIT: 病患 #36对他们不断恶化的精神和身体健康表示关切。因为我的初步检查发现，他的肌肉量和耐力都出现了不正常的高速增长，而病人声称他们从来没有采取措施来提高，比如通过体育锻炼。 在一项比较血流储备分数和血管内超声指导皮冠状动脉介入治疗的试验中，使用血流储备分数测定导致的冠状动脉异常较少。这可能表明患者摄入了激素放大物，这也可能是由患者散发的。我给他开了抗抑郁药，让他休息，并继续做检查。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Abbadon Taylor. Research ID #217G
Alpha-Taylinin is still not ready for large scale production. The peptide bonds still spotaneously break after ACT-Ray exposure causing the protein to break down before it manages to mutate all the blood cells in our samples. If only we could find some way of isolating substrate Bx55 we could see a product ready for actual testing within a month. But right now, no solution is in sight.
This is the farthest we've gotten, I know that this can save humanity. Just imagine: no more diseases, no more weakness. I am so close to a real breakthrough, I can feel it.
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿巴顿·泰勒。研究ID #217G
阿尔法-泰利宁还没有做好大规模生产的准备。在act射线暴露后，肽键仍然会突然断裂导致蛋白质在变异样本中的所有血细胞之前就会分解。如果我们能找到一些方法来隔离Bx55基板，我们就能在一个月内看到产品准备好进行实际测试。但目前还看不到任何解决方案。
这是我们最远的进展，我知道这可以拯救人类。想象一下：没有疾病，没有虚弱。我离真正的突破已经很近了，我能感觉到。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Abbadon Taylor. Research ID #217G
Alpha-Taylinin is finally ready. When my team showed me the autoclave it dawned on me. To think that the solution would be so simple!
We have already managed to create a large quantity of Alpha-Taylinin, all we need now is the Overseer's signature to begin distribution but the fool is stubborn. She refuses to see how these tests are necessary. She doesn't understand that this is the next step in human evolution! At least my team has full confidence in me and I am sure that, given some time, she might begin to see my point of view.
ESP.TRADUIT:
阿巴顿·泰勒。研究ID #217G
阿尔法-泰利宁终于准备好了。当我的团队向我展示高压灭菌器时，我恍然大悟。想想看，解决办法竟然如此简单！
我们已经成功生产了大量的阿尔法-泰利宁，我们现在只需要监督的签名就可以开始分发了，但那傻子很固执，她不认为这些测试有必要。她不明白这是人类进化的下一步！至少我的团队对我充满信心，我相信，给她一段时间，她可能会开始理解我的观点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient #123's frequent visits have indicated signs of hypochondriasis. The patient claims to feel faint after ingesting meals after 8 AM, and before 2 PM. Furthermore, the patient has no recollection of ever having visited me before (Amnesia? Early onset dementia?). Each consulatation has therefore followed the same pattern as the last. I ponder whether there are parts of the patient's brain one could remove to get rid of this bothersome condition. Will have to consult with my colleagues.
ESP.TRADUIT: 病患 #123频繁的就诊表明他有疑病症的迹象。患者声称在早上8点后和下午2点前进食后感到头晕。此外，患者不记得以前见过我(潜在的健忘症迹象？早发性痴呆？)因此，就诊往往具有类似的性质。我在考虑是否可以切除病人大脑的某些部分来摆脱这种烦人的状况，得和同事商量一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patient #101 has been expressing doubt that they actually exist within their own body, and that their body is "floating underneath" them. The patient bears no sign of physical abnormalities. From my diagnosis, and after consultation with Dr. Hubbard from Clinic 13, I've dicerned that the patient suffers from dissociative disorder. I have contacted psychologist Dr. Braum. In the meantime, since previous prescribed dosages have had limited observable effects, I have doubled the dosage of Abraxo and recommended more rest.
ESP.TRADUIT: 病患#101一直在怀疑自己是否真的存在于自己的身体里，而身体是“漂浮”在他们的身体下面。这个患者没有任何身体异常的迹象。根据我的诊断，并在咨询了13号诊所的哈伯德医生后，我认为这位患者患有分离性障碍。我已经联系了心理学家伊娃·布劳姆博士。与此同时，由于早期剂量的可观察效果有限，我将阿伯萨莱的剂量增加了一倍，并建议患者多休息。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF
Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: Parkinson had a good idea today. I honestly never thought I'd see the day but here we are. An isolation of the protein affecting substrate Bx55 could be possible using the old autoclave, since he was able to prove the heat resistant abilities of the substance. I am in utter shock as to how he came up with the idea before me. Maybe another anonymous complaint is in order, just to set things straight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 帕金森今天想到了一个好主意。说实话，我从未想过会有这一天，但现在我们已经做到了。可以用老式的高压釜分离出影响底物Bx55的蛋白质，因为他证明了这种物质的耐热能力。我对他是如何想到这个主意的感到十分震惊。也许应该再提交一份匿名投诉，以澄清事实。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Heeey Rebbie! Haha sure I'd love to, as long as you leave David to me. You know I'd never judge you, honey.
Yeah I know. I can't imagine what he's going through though, losing everyone you love like that. But seriously, I am not so sure if he's even fit for this kind of job anymore, what with the safety of the entire Vault on his shoulders and all.
Maybe we should have a meeting with everyone while we're at the diner. I'd actually like to ask them what they think, because I really think he should retire, or at least take a leave of absence. He's brilliant, but after all that's happened... I mean it feels like he could snap at a moment's notice! But at the same time I feel so sorry for him, maybe his job is all that's keeping him together.
Tell me what you think honey.
Kisses
ESP.TRADUIT:
嗨嗨嗨，瑞比！哈哈，我当然愿意，只要你把大卫交给我。你知道我永远不会评判你的，亲爱的。
嗯，我知道。我无法想象他经历了什么，就这样失去了所有你爱的人。但说真的，我不确定他是否还能胜任这份工作，因为整个避难所的安全都在他的肩上。
也许我们应该在吃饭的时候和大家开个会，我其实很想问问他们的想法。因为我真的认为他应该退休，至少暂时退休。他很聪明，但发生了那么多事...我的意思是，感觉他随时都可能崩溃！但同时我也为他感到难过，也许他的工作是他生活的唯一支柱。
告诉我你的想法，亲爱的。
亲亲

休息室终端密码
以上翻译结果来自有道神经网络翻译（YNMT）· 通用场景
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: The newly conducted test have finally shown some promise. The strength enhancing effect are undeniable as the animal tests have shown. Other effects, potentially harmful ones, would have to be discerned with human trials and I think we might actually be ready. The only problem is the Overseer and her exaggerated concern. But Taylor has a vision and I stand with the rest of the science team and suggest a modest amount of subjects at first, though some details around how the patients are supposed to be aquired would have to be ironed out. I will suggest that on the next meeti/((( [DATA CORRUPT]
ESP.TRADUIT: 新进行的试验终于显示出一些希望。正如动物实验所证明的那样，增强力量的效果是不可否认的。其他影响，潜在的有害影响，需要通过人体试验来识别，我认为我们可能已经准备好了。唯一的问题是监督和她过分的担忧。但泰勒有远见，我和科学团队的其他成员站在一起，建议一开始使用数量适中的受试者，尽管有关如何获取患者的一些细节还有待解决。我将在下次会议上建议（[数据损坏]）

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey Jane, hope all is well all the way over there in sector 5. Doesn't Patrick still work at the diner there? Maybe we could hang out there next time we get off work at the same time? Haha don't judge me!
By the way, I've heard even more people from the team talk about Taylor. He's been so sad lately it's like he's not himself anymore. Maybe we could fix something to cheer him up sometime?
Kisses!
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿简，希望第五区的一切都好。帕特里克不是还在那家餐厅工作吗？也许我们下次下班的时候可以一起去那里玩？哈哈，别对我评头论足！
顺便说一下，我听到团队里有更多的人在谈论泰勒。他最近太伤心了，好像失去了自我。也许我们可以找个时间做点什么让他高兴起来？
亲亲！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Hey hey, Patrick!
You won't guess who wants to see you, lucky boy! Do you remember Rebecca? The short girl, with lovely green eyes and black hair? A little bird told me you'd better be at work next friday!
Hugs!
ESP.TRADUIT:
嘿，嘿，帕特里克！
哈哈，你猜不到谁想见你，幸运的小子！你还记得瑞贝卡吗？那个长着可爱的绿色眼睛和黑色头发的矮个女孩？有人告诉我，你下周五最好来上班！
拥抱！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Tray,
What do you think about that demonstration yesterday and Collins' latest toys?
Honestly I fail to see the sense in wasting all these resouces on such extreme security. Have we even had that many incidents here? Who even approved this resource allocation?
And why does Vault-Tec want them covered with their brand? They're more like an army at this point rather than a security detail.
I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this. You always had the bigger brain between the two of us.
Regards James Realton
ESP.TRADUIT:
特雷。
你觉得昨天的演示和柯林斯最新的玩具怎么样？
老实说，我看不出在如此极端的安全措施上浪费这么多资源有什么意义。我们这里发生过那么多事故吗？是谁批准了这种资源分配？
为什么避难所科技要在上面印上自己的商标？他们现在更像是一支军队，而不是安保人员。
我期待听到你对此的想法，你一直都是我们两个中比较聪明的那个。
此致 - 詹姆斯·里尔顿

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF
Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF
Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: The ownership of Coco is attributed to whoever is the holder of this deed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可可的所有权归这份契约的持有人所有。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Corporal Soya,
You and your men are ordered to secure the Tohatu Cave, and clear the creature infestation within. I have authorized the use of dynamite to seal off the infested areas, in preparation for further geological studies and possible iron deposit extraction. Use caution so as not to alert the local miners operating in the area of our intention to find alternative sources of iron in "their claim". Upon completion, return to McCarran for further instructions.
Major Polac
ESP.TRADUIT:
索亚下士，
你和你的人奉命保护土哈图洞穴，清除洞内的生物。我已经授权使用炸药封锁受感染的地区，为进一步的地质研究和可能的铁矿开采做准备。要小心，不要提醒在该地区作业的当地矿工，我们打算在他们声称是“他们的地区”寻找替代的铁来源。完成后，回到麦卡伦接受进一步指示。
- 波拉克少校

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's so cold in here. The screams outside have stopped but I can hear footsteps and faint whispers. I can't open the door, I won't. Mom didn't even recognize me. I can still hear her voice in my head talking. But I won't open the door. She can't make me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里好冷啊。外面的尖叫声已经停止了，但我能听到脚步声和微弱的低语。我不能开门，我不会的，妈妈甚至认不出我了，我仍然能听到她在我脑海里说话。但是我不会开门的，她不能强迫我。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Ingmar Hepburn. Maintenance ID #885D
Man, the raw power of this place is fascinating. With its extraordinary capacity to refine used nuclear material, I'd be surprised if we didn't last for hundreds of years!
Reactors two and three have been acting a bit strange as of late however. Their temperatures seem to be rising at regular intervals to values way above what the system is built to handle, only to suddenly drop within normal ranges in mere minutes. It almost seems to be happening deliberately, but I'll have to check with Coulder later if he has any idea about what's going on.
ESP.TRADUIT:
英格玛·赫本。维护ID #885D
天啊，这个地方的原始力量太令人着迷了，以它提炼使用过的核材料的非凡能力，如果我们没有在这里坚持数百年，我才会感到惊讶！
不过，二号和三号反应堆最近的表现有点奇怪。它们的温度似乎每隔一段时间就会升高一次，其数值远远超出了系统的承受能力，但在短短几分钟内又会突然降到正常范围内。这看起来就像是有人故意为之。我稍后得去问问库尔德是否知道发生了什么事。
加布里埃尔潦草的笔记
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
If anyone is reading this it means that I am dead.
They took my friend Elisa. I can only hope that whoever is reading this can at least get her out and save her from this hell. You have to.
I saw them taking her towards the laboratory section of the vault. The normal way down there is locked, but there is another way. Apparently it's possible to reach the water treatment section through the reactor, and then from there gain access to the laboratory.
Before they caught me I managed found out the Overseer's Override Code. It's R4D b3 90N. I hope it'll help you find Elisa somehow.
Please don't let her suffer the same fate as I did. God help you.
ESP.TRADUIT:
如果有人读到这篇文章，意味着我死了。
他们带走了我的朋友埃莉萨。我只希望读这篇文章的人至少能把她弄出来，把她从这个地狱里救出来。你必须这么做。
我看到他们把她带到地下室的实验室区。往下走的路被锁住了，但还有另一条路。显然有可能通过反应堆到达水处理区，然后从那里进入实验室。
在他们抓到我之前我设法找到了监督的超控密码，是R4D b3 90N。我希望这能帮你找到埃莉萨。
请不要让她和我遭受同样的命运。上帝保佑你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF
Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
VAULT-TEC AUTOMATIC VOICE TO TEXT BEGINS:
Officer Rober here, situation update. The crime rate is unprecedented, there is panic spreading all throughout the vault. We have lost contact with sectors twelve and thirteen, so we have no idea how the situation is developing over there. God knows what caused all this - I've heard people screaming about not drinking the water but I wouldn't know, I haven't gotten any word from Collins or Taylor about another test. I never thought they would do anything like this, the situation is out of control and-
VAULT-TEC AUTOMATIC VOICE TO TEXT ENDS:
ESP.TRADUIT:
避难所科技自动语音转文本开始:
我是罗伯警官，这里是最新情况。犯罪率是空前的，整个避难所都弥漫着恐慌。我们与12区和13区失去了联系，所以我们不知道那里的情况会怎样发展，但上帝知道是什么造成了这一切。我听到人们尖叫着说不要喝这水，但我不知道，我没有从柯林斯或泰勒那里得到关于另一项测试的消息。我从来没有想到他们会做这样的事，局势已经失控了
避难所科技自动语音转文本结束:

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Holodisk\Holodisk01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
WARNING! Water unsafe for consumtion. Unknown additives found.
Water percentage: 88 % Serum 50B percentage: 2 % Serum 3UT percentage 3 % Unknown additive percentage: 7 %
Code 33xB-TAYLOR Message override.
Report NOT forwarded to all computers linked to Vault-Tec servers.
ESP.TRADUIT:
警告！饮用水不安全。发现未知的添加剂。
含水率:88% 血清50B比例:2% 血清3UT比例:3% 未知添加剂含量:7%
代码33xB-TAYLOR消息覆盖。
报告没有转发到与避难所科技服务器相连的所有计算机。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Clutter\Junk\Paper01.NIF

ESP.ORIGINAL:
I couldn't even say goodbye so I'm writing this. Maybe you are watching over me as I write, and can see my pain. This world was never good enough for you. It did not deserve you Juni. You knew this and left it. So I'll follow, and so will everyone else, we will all join you Juni. I just want to hold you in my arms and see you smile, Juni. Everyone here did, they told me so.
We are leaving now sweet Juni, we are going to join you. This world was never beautiful enough for you, you deserve so much more. Paradise
ESP.TRADUIT:
我甚至不能说再见，所以我写了这个。也许你在看着我写作，看到我的痛苦。这个世界对你来说永远都不够好。它配不上你，朱妮。你知道这一点，就离开了，所以我也跟上了。其他人也一样，我们都会加入你，朱妮。我只想把你抱在怀里，看你微笑，朱妮。这里的每个人都这么说。
我们现在要走了，亲爱的朱妮，我们要去找你。这个世界对你来说从来就不够美丽，你值得拥有更多。天堂

ESP.ORIGINAL: Larry told me that Sheila has been asking about me. I've always thought that there were something about the way she looked at me! I'm going to ask her out when I get off this boring ass shift.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拉里告诉我希拉一直在打听我的情况，我一直觉得她看我的眼神有点蹊跷！等我下班了，我要约她出去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Vault76Meshes\Vault76Confetti2.nif

ESP.TRADUIT: 26号避难所 - 北部次级反应堆
26号避难所 - 北部次级反应堆

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elisa's back! Nice work, though I'm sad to hear Gabriel never made it out...
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨回来了！干得漂亮，不过听说加布里埃尔没能逃出来，我很难过...

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gabriel's back! Nice work, though I'm sad to hear Elisa never made it out...
ESP.TRADUIT: 加布里埃尔回来了！干得漂亮，不过听说埃莉萨没能逃出来，我很难过...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_greeting_00000be4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sad to hear that noone made it out from down there... Guess I should've expected it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听说没有人从下面逃出来，我很难过...看来我早该预料到。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_greeting_00000be3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks for helping Elisa and Gabriel! I honestly never thought anyone was still alive down there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你帮助埃莉萨和加布里埃尔！老实说，我没想过下面还有人活着！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_greeting_00000be2_1.ogg

NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_greeting_00000be0_1.ogg

NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_greeting_00000be1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm? Oh, sorry. I was kinda lost in my thought there. What do you need?
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯？哦，抱歉，我当时有点走神了。你需要什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_greeting_000079c4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hi again! I got word from Shamble that their problems have been solved thanks to you! I am so grateful. Here take your 50 caps with my thanks!
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了！我从乱麻镇那里得到消息，他们的问题已经解决了，多亏了你！我很感激。请收下你的50瓶盖，谢谢！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_greeting_000079ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry, I don't have time to talk right now, I got a lot of things on my mind. Excuse me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我现在没有时间说话，我脑子里有很多事情。不好意思。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_greeting_000079cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. Did you need anything else?
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。你还需要什么吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_greeting_000079c5_1.ogg

NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_greeting_000079c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why hello! Nice to see a new person around these parts. I'm Tempeh. I'm in charge of this mining operation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂你好！很高兴在这附近见到一个新人。我是丹贝，我负责这个采矿项目。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00001cf1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not that eh, we have been mining a whole lot lately...
ESP.TRADUIT: 不是说，呃，我们最近一直在挖矿...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00001cf1_2.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00001cf2_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00001cf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, hello again! Was there something else you needed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，又见面了！你还需要什么别的吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00001cf4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd prefer if you didn't wave your gun around, we´re all friends here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你别拿着枪晃来晃去，我们都是朋友。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00006cc6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh. What are you doing here? There's not much left here...
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦。你在这里干什么？这里已经不剩什么了...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00003a51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hello again. You know, I'm glad at least someone made it out from down there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 又见面了。你知道的，我很高兴至少有人从下面逃出来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_greeting_00003a52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No no no... Why? What is happening?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不不不...为什么？噢，亲爱的上帝，为什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_greeting_000026d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe if... what? No, get away!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_greeting_000026d7_1.ogg

Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_greeting_000026d8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The pressure is off by zero point seven percent.
ESP.TRADUIT: 压力偏差为百分之零点七。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [05001928] (ID) Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Where is everyone? Am I alone here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 大家都去哪儿了？只有我一个人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [05001928] (ID) Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_greeting_00003b18_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please sir, I can't be disturbed right now, I have a lot to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，先生，我现在不能被打扰，我有很多事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [05001928] (ID) Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please madam, I can't be disturbed right now, I have a lot to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，女士，我现在不能被打扰，我有很多事要做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [05001928] (ID) Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Quiet, I need to think. Quiet!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [0500375E] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [0500375F] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [05003760] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [05003761] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [0500400D] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [050026EF] (mod) NPC : Insane Vault Dweller [05001F1E] (mod) Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_greeting_000025da_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elisa has been freed. The spirits had faith and so did I. Thank you wanderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨被释放了。精灵有信用，我也有。谢谢你，流浪者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000052d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You helped Gabriel. He is an important soul that one. You did very well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你帮了加布里埃尔，他是一个重要的人物。你做得很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000052cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that you would help us. The spirits are at ease. I am forever in your debt for getting Elisa and Gabriel out of that darkness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道你会帮我们，精灵们放心了。你把埃莉萨和加布里埃尔从黑暗中救出来，我永远欠你人情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000052ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, allow me to give you a discount, for everything that you've done.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请允许我给你打个折，感谢你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000052ce_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, I haven't seen you around these sands before. I am Anuah. What brings you out here wanderer?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，我还没在这片沙子上见过你呢。我是阿努阿，什么风把你吹来了，流浪者？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_00002b6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought you would come back.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000042e6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've returned. How can I aid you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了。我能为你做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_greeting_000052cd_1.ogg
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure the NCR is going to try to tax the very dirt we stand on. I'm telling you, when they do, I'm getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定NCR会试图对我们脚下的泥土征税。我告诉你，只要他们来了，我就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f75_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Denars, dollars or caps. I don't care as long as I get paid, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第纳尔、美元或者瓶盖。只要能拿到钱，我不在乎，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That there bunker underneath makes me a bit nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面的地堡让我有点紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f77_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever been to a Legion mine? Those slaves don't know a pick from a spade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过军团矿场吗？那些奴隶连铲子和镐头都分不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing is going to convince me to go into that damn Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不能说服我进那该死的避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard screaming coming out of the mine. That vault gives me nightmares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了矿井里传出尖叫声。那个避难所让我做噩梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what Tempeh says, I think they're all dead down there in that Vault. I mean the stories he told of the place? Creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管丹贝怎么说，我觉得他们都死在避难所里了。我是说他讲的那个地方的故事，令人毛骨悚然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice job saving Gabriel. I've missed that bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，救了加布里埃尔。我想死那个杂碎了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The story Elisa tells of that bunker! I feel like she's just making it all up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨讲的那个地堡的故事！我觉得这一切都是她瞎编的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You looking for work? Look elsewhere. With the trouble we've had, I think they'll just shut the mine down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找工作？去别的地方看看吧。鉴于我们遇到的麻烦，我觉得他们会直接关闭矿井的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about Clarence and Mathilda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉伦斯和玛蒂尔达的事我很遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for saving Elisa and Gabriel! It's nice to have them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你救了埃莉萨和加布里埃尔！他们能回来真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f80_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Elisa made it out. I'm sorry for Gabriel though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好歹埃莉萨逃出来了，不过我为加布里埃尔感到遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With four miners dead, I'm not sure if Tempeh can keep this place running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四名矿工遇难，我不确定丹贝还能不能维持这里的运转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f82_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Gabriel made it out. I'm sorry for Elisa though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少加布里埃尔逃出来了，不过我为埃莉萨感到遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe no one made it out from down there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信没有一个人从下面逃出来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f84_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You here for work? Don't bother. We don't have any vacancies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来工作的？不用麻烦了，我们没有任何空缺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_greeting_00003f85_1.ogg
Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaledvoicetype\vault76min_greeting_00003f86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Photonic sensor reception unclear. Please state your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 光子传感器接收不清。请说出你的姓名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_greeting_00003e83_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Greetings. Welcome to the Reactor level. How may I be of assistance today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 向您问好，欢迎来到反应堆层。今天我能为您做些什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_greeting_00003e78_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec will clean this mess right up, I am sure of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技很快会把这烂摊子收拾干净的，我敢肯定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_greeting_00003e7a_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 您好先生...女士...先生...女士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_greeting_00003e7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry I can't talk right now I... wait... I know you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我现在不能说话，我...等等...我知道你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Priestly [050041C2] (mod) Quest : ([050041C5]Vault76DialogueOfficer) Vault76DialogueOfficer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76officervoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_000041c6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You've been snooping around here. Getting friendly with the prisoners! Planning an escape are we? No, no that won't work.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在这里到处打探，跟囚犯搞好关系！在计划逃跑吗？不，不，那不行。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Priestly [050041C2] (mod) Quest : ([050041C5]Vault76DialogueOfficer) Vault76DialogueOfficer EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76officervoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_000041c6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one escapes from prison under my watch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人能在我的看守下逃出监狱！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Priestly [050041C2] (mod) Quest : ([050041C5]Vault76DialogueOfficer) Vault76DialogueOfficer EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76officervoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_000041c6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ahhh, a new patient! What seems to be the problem? Lets have a look at you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，一个新病人！有什么问题吗？让我看看你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Svensson [05001E17] (mod) Quest : ([0500429E]Vault76MadDoctorDialogue) Vault76MadDoctorDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76maddoctorvoicetype\vault76mad_greeting_0000429f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please relax, this won't take long at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别紧张，不会花很长时间的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Svensson [05001E17] (mod) Quest : ([0500429E]Vault76MadDoctorDialogue) Vault76MadDoctorDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76maddoctorvoicetype\vault76mad_greeting_0000429f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hmm, I see. I'm sorry, but I think there is no other option but to... amputate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯我明白了。我很抱歉，但我想除了截肢...别无选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Svensson [05001E17] (mod) Quest : ([0500429E]Vault76MadDoctorDialogue) Vault76MadDoctorDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76maddoctorvoicetype\vault76mad_greeting_0000429f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just stand still! All will be over soon!
ESP.TRADUIT: 站着别动！一切很快就会结束！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Dr. Svensson [05001E17] (mod) Quest : ([0500429E]Vault76MadDoctorDialogue) Vault76MadDoctorDialogue EmotionType : Anger

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you're not one of them! What are you... how did you get down here? Did Tempeh send you? Never mind, get me out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么，你不是他们的人！你在... 你怎么到这里来的？丹贝派你来的吗？算了，把我弄出去！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_000042a3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think there's a key in the Wardens office. Hurry! Before he comes back!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想监狱长办公室里有把钥匙。快点！在他回来之前！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_000042a3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think there's a key in the warden's office. Please hurry! Before he comes back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想监狱长办公室里有把钥匙。请快一点！在他回来之前！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00003f51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have no idea who you are but thank you so much! Let's get the hell out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你是谁，但是非常感谢！我们赶紧离开这鬼地方！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_0000429a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let's get the hell out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们赶紧离开这鬼地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00004bf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey again! I just wanted to say how grateful I am that you got Elisa out of there. I've been worried sick over her since I got out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，又来了！我只想说我很感激你把埃莉萨救出来了，我出来后一直很担心她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00001f05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then I saw her coming out of that hell hole, I could hardly believe my eyes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后我看到她从那个地狱里出来，我简直不敢相信我的眼睛。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00001f05_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just can't tell you how lucky we were that you came along. I'll never forget it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有你出现我们真是太幸运了。我永远不会忘记的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00001f05_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, man am I glad to be out of that hole. Thanks again!
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我真高兴能从那个洞里出来。再次感谢你的帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_0000485d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's great to see you again! How have you been, what's the haps?
ESP.TRADUIT: 再次见到你真是太好了！你过得怎么样，最近还好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00001f03_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh hey! I was just thinking about my, er- I mean our great escape. Makes for one hell of a story am I right!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢嘿！我只是在想我的，呃...我是说我们的大逃亡。这真是个精彩的故事，对吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00001f04_1.ogg
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Coco looks a little groggy. Maybe from using too many drugs.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [可可看起来有点昏昏沉沉的，也许是因为使用了太多药物的原因。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Coco looks at you curiously. Maybe this animal would be interested in assisting you on your travels if she were to be bought.]
ESP.TRADUIT: [可可好奇地看着你。如果她被买下来的话，也许这只动物会有兴趣在你的旅途中帮助你。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Coco looks a little groggy. Maybe from using too many drugs]
ESP.TRADUIT: [可可看起来有点昏昏沉沉的，也许是因为使用了太多药物的原因。]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec is proud to demonstrate this security unit. Outfitted with state of the art weaponry for your safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技很荣幸地展示这个安保单位。它配备了最先进的武器，确保您的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_greeting_00003869_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A very Vault-Tec day to you, valued Vault resident. Please stand clear of this security unit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊贵的避难所居民，祝您避难所科技日快乐。请远离这个安保单位。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Valued Vault resident, do not be afraid. This unit will keep you safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊贵的避难所居民，不要害怕。这个单位会保护您的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_greeting_00003873_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {F}Valued Vault resident, do not be afraid. This unit will keep you safe.
ESP.TRADUIT: {F}尊贵的避难所居民，不要害怕。这个单位会保护您的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronfemalevoicetype\vault76sec_greeting_00003872_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well. You've made it this far. I have taken note of your progress throughout my vault, and I must say that I am impressed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好，你已经走到这一步了。我注意到了你在避难所的进展，我必须说，我很钦佩。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_greeting_00004f2f_1.ogg
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: So you came. I should've guessed that you wouldn't follow my advice, as sound as it may be.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你来了。我早该猜到你不会听从我的建议，尽管这建议听起来很合理。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_greeting_0000557a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am curious however. So tell me, what happens now?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我很好奇。告诉我，现在会发生什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_greeting_0000557a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just take your friend and leave. I need some time to reflect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 带着你的朋友离开吧。我需要一些时间来思考。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_greeting_000068ae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't let you stop me!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Welcome valued Vault resident. How may I be of assistance today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 欢迎宝贵的避难所居民。今天我可以为您提供什么帮助？ ?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_greeting_00005223_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 祝您有一个非常棒的避难所科技日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know that Vault-Tec is one of the top companies in the world? Amazing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 您知道避难所科技是世界上最顶尖的公司之一吗？太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not take a minute to read a book in the library?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不花点时间在图书馆里看书呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop by the cinema to enjoy the amazing adventures of Vault Boy. Now in technicolor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便去电影院享受避难所小子的奇妙冒险。现在是彩色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec industries Vault-Tec mart; for any and all of your shopping needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技工业，避难所科技市场，满足您所有的购物需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: A very Vault-Tec day to you, valued Vault-Resident. Please stand clear of this security unit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尊贵的避难所居民，祝您避难所科技日快乐。请远离这个安保单位。
