ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec is proud to demonstrate this security unit. Outfitted with state of the art weaponry for your safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技很荣幸地展示这个安保单位。它配备了最先进的武器，确保您的安全。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_greeting_000032d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you can't imagine how happy I am that you came along when you did!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你无法想象你出现的时候我有多高兴！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_000073ea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was so worried when they started shooting, I've never been so stressed in my life.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们开始射击的时候我很担心，我这辈子从来没有这么紧张过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_000073ea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what am I thinking, thank you so much. But who are you and what are you doing here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我在想什么呢，太谢谢你了。但你是谁，你在这里做什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_000073ea_3.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_000073f0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't wait to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等不及要离开这里了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00000b8a_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00000b8b_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00000b89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're back! How have you been?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来了！你过得怎么样？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00000b9c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey again! I- I just have to thank you again... I'd still be down there if it weren't for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嘿，又来了！我，我想再次感谢你...如果不是你，我还在下面呢。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00002f76_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still can't believe we made it out from there! What's up?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我还是不敢相信我们从那里逃出来了！有什么事吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_greeting_00000b9d_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_playerthrowgren_0000e1c1_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_playerfireweapo_0000e79c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Discharging of weapons in the common area is highly discouraged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 非常不鼓励在公共区域内释放武器的行为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_playerfireweapo_00005226_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_playerzkeyobjec_0000e1c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Can you not knock around my things?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能别乱碰我的东西吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_playerknockover_0000e79d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Denars, dollars or caps. I don't care as long as I get paid, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 第纳尔、美元或者瓶盖。只要能拿到钱，我不在乎，懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b42_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That there bunker underneath makes me a bit nervous.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面的地堡让我有点紧张。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b43_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You ever been to a Legion mine? Those slaves don't know a pick from a spade.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你去过军团矿场吗？那些奴隶连铲子和镐头都分不清。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b44_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nothing is going to convince me to go into that damn Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么都不能说服我进那该死的避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b45_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've heard screaming coming out of the mine. That Vault gives me nightmares.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听到了矿井里传出尖叫声。那个避难所让我做噩梦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b46_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care what Tempeh says, I think they're all dead down there in that Vault. I mean the stories he told of the place? Creepy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管丹贝怎么说，我觉得他们都死在避难所里了。我是说他讲的那个地方的故事，令人毛骨悚然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b47_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Nice job saving Gabriel. I've missed that bastard!
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，救了加布里埃尔。我想死那个杂碎了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaleavocietype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b60_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The story Elisa tells of that bunker! I feel like she's just making it all up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨讲的那个地堡的故事！我觉得这一切都是她瞎编的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaledvoicetype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b62_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You looking for work? Look elsewhere. With the trouble we've had, I think they'll just shut the mine down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你在找工作？去别的地方看看吧。鉴于我们遇到的麻烦，我觉得他们会直接关闭矿井的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaleavocietype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b5b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry about Clarence and Mathilda.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉伦斯和玛蒂尔达的事我很遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b61_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for saving Elisa and Gabriel! It's nice to have them back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢你救了埃莉萨和加布里埃尔！他们能回来真好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaleavocietype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b63_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Elisa made it out. I'm sorry for Gabriel though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好歹埃莉萨逃出来了，不过我为加布里埃尔感到遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b67_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: With four miners dead, I'm not sure if Tempeh can keep this place running.
ESP.TRADUIT: 四名矿工遇难，我不确定丹贝还能不能维持这里的运转。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b65_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: At least Gabriel made it out. I'm sorry for Elisa though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至少加布里埃尔逃出来了，不过我为埃莉萨感到遗憾。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b66_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't believe no one made it out from down there...
ESP.TRADUIT: 真不敢相信没有一个人从下面逃出来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b64_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You here for work? Don't bother. We don't have any vacancies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是来工作的？不用麻烦了，我们没有任何空缺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaleavocietype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b59_1.ogg
Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermaledvoicetype\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b5a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The story Elisa tells about that bunker. I feel like she's just making it all up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨说的那个地堡的故事，我觉得这一切都是她瞎编的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_000013ab_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sure the NCR is going to try to tax the very dirt we stand on. I'm telling you, when they do, I'm getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我敢肯定NCR会试图对我们脚下的泥土征税。我告诉你，只要他们来了，我就离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76minerdialogue_hello_00003b41_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 祝您有一个非常棒的避难所科技日。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f96_1.ogg

NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you know that Vault-Tec is one of the top companies in the world? Amazing!
ESP.TRADUIT: 您知道避难所科技是世界上最顶尖的公司之一吗？太棒了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why not take a minute to read a book in the library?
ESP.TRADUIT: 为什么不花点时间在图书馆里看书呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f99_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drop by the cinema to enjoy the amazing adventures of Vault Boy. Now in technicolor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便去电影院享受避难所小子的奇妙冒险。现在是彩色的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f9a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec industries Vault-Tec mart; for any and all of your shopping needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 避难所科技工业，避难所科技市场，满足您所有的购物需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_hello_00001f9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry it came to this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉事情变成这样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_attack_0000e4ba_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_attack_0000e4bb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanna be a cowboy, baby!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想成为一个牛仔宝贝！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_attack_00003769_1.ogg

Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_attack_000025dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Stay away! You make too much noise!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_attack_000024ce_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're the only one who knows! I'll take it from you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你是唯一知道的人！ 我要从你那里得到它！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_attack_0000254b_1.ogg

Quest : ([050026D5]Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue) Vault76InhabitantCrazyDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76inhabitantcrazyvoicetype\vault76inh_attack_000025cb_1.ogg
Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_attack_00003b05_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm about to rock your world!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_attack_00003b06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Get the hell out of our town!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050037CB]Vault76MinerDialogue) Vault76MinerDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76minermalevoicetypeb\vault76min_attack_00003b07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Firing lasers. Please, do not take this the wrong way. I am only doing my job.
ESP.TRADUIT: 发射激光。请别误会我的意思，我只是在履行我的职责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_attack_00003e7d_1.ogg

Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_attack_00003e82_1.ogg

Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_attack_00003e9d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Target has been dispatched. Error. Faulty information disregarded: Re-engaging previous target.
ESP.TRADUIT: 目标已被处决。错误。已忽略错误信息：重新攻击上一个目标。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_attack_000079f3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No one escapes from prison under my watch!
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有人能在我的看守下逃出监狱！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Officer Priestly [050041C2] (mod) Quest : ([050041C5]Vault76DialogueOfficer) Vault76DialogueOfficer EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76officervoicetype\vault76dia_attack_00004933_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_attack_00001c50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locking me up huh? Think I'd just live and let live huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我关起来是吗？ 以为我只会宽以待人是吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_attack_00001c5b_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_attack_00001c5c_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 让我们抓住这些小混球。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_attack_00001c5d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Judge, Jury and Executioner protocol engaged. Dispatching known criminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 法官、陪审团和刽子手 - 协议已启用。迅速处理已知罪犯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_attack_000045c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {F}Judge, jury and executioner-protocol engaged. Dispatching known criminal.
ESP.TRADUIT: {F}法官、陪审团和刽子手 - 协议已启用。迅速处理已知罪犯。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Any civilian in the vicinity should vacate the area at once. Why not head to Vault-Tec Industries Mart. For any and all of your shopping needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: 附近的任何平民都应立即撤离该地区。为什么不去避难所科技工业市场呢？满足您所有的购物需求。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_attack_00003879_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {F}Any civilian in the vicinity should vacate the area at once. Why not head to Vault-Tec Industries Mart. For any and all of your shopping needs.
ESP.TRADUIT: {F}附近的任何平民都应立即撤离该地区。为什么不去避难所科技工业市场呢？满足您所有的购物需求。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Dispatching hostile. You can always count on Vault-Tec to keep its residents safe and healthy.
ESP.TRADUIT: 迅速处理敌人。您可以永远依靠避难所科技来保证居民的安全和健康。

ESP.TRADUIT: {F}迅速处理敌人。您可以永远依靠避难所科技来保证居民的安全和健康。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a security announcement from Vault-Tec. This area is off limits for civilians until the suspect has been dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是避难所科技公司的安全通告。在嫌疑人被处理之前，这片区域禁止平民进入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_attack_0000389a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Vault-Tec would like to advise every Vault resident to seek shelter until the threat has been dealt with.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在此，避难所科技建议所有的避难所居民，在危机解决之前，尽快寻找庇护所。

ESP.TRADUIT: 我们是时候分道扬镳了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we should travel together.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, stick with me for a little longer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想了一下，还是留在我身边吧。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, that makes me so happy! You are too much!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，这太让我高兴了！你真的太好了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Sarah [00116597] (file) EmotionType : Happy
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you not to attack enemies unless I've already engaged them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我没有动手，你也不要擅自攻击敌人。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want you to attack enemies the moment you see them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要你看到敌人就马上攻击他们。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like you to go back to the Lucky 38 for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望你现在回幸运38赌场去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Coco nods both her heads and gives a small moo in agreement]
ESP.TRADUIT: [可可点了点头，发出一个小哞声表示同意]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: {Rhonda} Utobitha, I'm here with Best Friend Tabitha, who has a message for all the dumb-dumbs out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: {Rhonda}乌托比萨，我和我最好的朋友塔比莎在一起，她有话要对外面所有的笨蛋说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [000E60F1] (ID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember: Vault-Tec is not liable for any harm that may befall you as a result of your criminal activity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住：避难所科技不会对您的犯罪行为所造成的任何伤害负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_healthhalf_0000387f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Remember: Vault-Tec is not liable for any harm that may befall you as a result of your criminal activity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请记住：避难所科技不会对您的犯罪行为所造成的任何伤害负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_healthhalf_000038c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {F}Remember: Vault-Tec is not liable for any harm that may befall you as a result of your criminal activity.
ESP.TRADUIT: {F}请记住：避难所科技不会对您的犯罪行为所造成的任何伤害负责。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronfemalevoicetype\vault76sec_healthhalf_00003880_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is a Vault-Tec issued warning: cease any and all hostile behavior, or face punishment up to and including: Death.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是避难所科技发布的警告：终止所有敌对行为，否则将面临惩罚，甚至死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_healthhalf_00003894_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: {F}This is a Vault-Tec issued warning: cease any and all hostile behavior, or face punishment up to and including: Death.
ESP.TRADUIT: {F}这是避难所科技发布的警告：终止所有敌对行为，否则将面临惩罚，甚至死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronfemalevoicetype\vault76sec_healthhalf_000038a8_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 持续受损。联系避难所技术员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronvoicetype\vault76sec_crippled_0000389f_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: {F}持续受损。联系避难所技术员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([050045C8]Vault76SecuritronDialogue) Vault76SecuritronDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronfemalevoicetype\vault76sec_crippled_000038ae_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到避难所肢体错误。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_crippled_00006087_1.ogg

NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_crippled_00006088_1.ogg

NPC : Protectron [05003810] (mod) NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_crippled_00006089_1.ogg
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait... what? You are serious? Oh, my God, you're insane!
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等...什么？你是认真的？噢天啊，你疯了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b52_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm &PCName;. I was sent down here by Tempeh.
Tempeh? So he made it out? I'm glad, I was sure I was the only one still alive. Do you know if anyone else made it?
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹贝？所以他逃出来了？我很高兴，我确信我是唯一还活着的人。你知道还有谁成功了吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gabriel! Is he ok, have you seen him?
ESP.TRADUIT: 加布里埃尔！他还好吗，你见过他吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b49_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He's safe, I escorted him out earlier.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他很安全，之前我送他出去了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is good to hear, he's always been able to get himself out of trouble, no matter what he's gotten himself into. Thank you, for helping him!
ESP.TRADUIT: 听你这么说真是太好了，不管他惹上了什么麻烦，他总能让自己摆脱困境。谢谢你帮助他！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now we got to start thinking about how to get out of here ourselves.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在我们得想办法自己离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b4f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It seems like the way you came in has been blocked but I think I know where we might find another way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你进来的路好像被堵住了，但我想我知道哪里可以找到另一条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b4f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've been dragging me all over this place and even though it is a little hard to get your bearings I know that there are some offices in the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们一直拖着我在这到处走，虽然有点难以了解你的方位，但我知道后面有一些办公室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b4f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's a long shot but I still think it's our best bet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然希望不大，但我仍然认为这是我们最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b4f_5.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但他已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? No, that can't be true, please say it isn't true!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？不，那不可能是真的，请告诉我那不是真的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b51_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh God... But I can't give up. He would've never have wanted me to give up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢天啊...但我不能放弃，他绝不会希望我放弃的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b51_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, lets just get out of here as fast as we can. The way you came in seems to be blocked but there are some old offices In the back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托了，我们快点离开这里吧。你进来的路好像被堵住了，但后面有一些旧办公室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b51_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe there's a way out from there?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b51_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right? Did that Professor hurt you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？那个教授伤害你了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Are you all right? Did that Professor hurt you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没事吧？那个教授伤害你了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I'm alright. He did draw some of my blood, but he was strangely calm and gentle about it, he seemed to know what he was doing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我没事。他确实抽了一些我的血，但他出奇地平静和温柔，他似乎知道自己在做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b57_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He tried to explain that I was saving them all, that he would do his best not to hurt me but that, If I tried to resist...
ESP.TRADUIT: 他试图向我解释，我是在拯救他们所有人，他会尽力不伤害我，但如果我试图反抗...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b57_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He would gladly sacrifice me for the "greater good".
ESP.TRADUIT: 他会很乐意为了“更大的利益”而牺牲我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b57_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While he was clearly insane I got this strange feeling that he might've been able to...
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然他显然是疯了，但我有一种奇怪的感觉，他可能...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b57_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But it is no use thinking about it. We're alive and he's not. Lets just focus on getting out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是想这些也没用，我们还活着，他死了。我们还是想办法离开这里吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisafir_00000b57_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this might be the office of that other scientist the one responsible for all this. Let's look around, see if we can't find out why he did it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这可能是另一个科学家的办公室，那个负责这一切的人。让我们四处看看，看看能不能找出他这么做的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is his office... They dragged me here a couple of times when he wanted to explain something or other.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是他的办公室...有几次他想解释的时候他们就把我拉过来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b7b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I never really understood what he was talking about but I did enjoy being out of that pod atleast.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我一直不太明白他在说什么，但至少我很享受离开那个舱的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b7b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this might be the way. I know that there are some kind of tunnels up ahead, hopefully one of them leads the way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这可能是解决办法。我知道前面有一些类似隧道的东西，希望其中有一条能从这里出去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b7d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't like the look of those barrels. I think there might be radiation up ahead. Maybe it would be best if we got ourselves some protective gear.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不喜欢那些桶的样子。我觉得前面可能有辐射，也许我们最好弄些防护装备。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b7f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, like those suits on that shelf over there!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，就像那边架子上的那些西装一样！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b7f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That place... Doesn't look safe. If we go in there, I think I would need some kind of protection from all the radiation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个地方...看起来不太安全。如果我们进去，我想我需要某种防护措施来抵御辐射。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b81_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That door leads to a place full of that green stuff... We'd better suit up if we're going in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那扇门通向一个到处都是绿色东西的地方...如果我们要进去的话，最好穿上防护服。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b83_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b85_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b86_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00001fc5_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisagoo_00000b8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope we find some way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我们能找到出去的路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisagoo_00000b8e_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisagoo_00000b8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, see you. I'll still be here for a few days so, don't be a stranger.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，再见。我还会在这里待上几天，所以，别太见外了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisagoo_00000bae_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I understand. Take care of yourself. I hope we'll meet again sometime.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我明白，多保重。我希望我们有机会再见面。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisagoo_00000baf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think we might be close now.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b94_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is such a maze.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Did you hear that? Nah, it was probably nothing. This place really gets to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你听到了吗？不，可能没什么，这个地方真的很让人难受。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b96_1.ogg
NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think this might actually be the way out! I can't believe we found it! Lets hurry up and get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得这可能就是出路！真不敢相信我们找到了！让我们快点离开这里！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisacom_00000b9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
You know, I used to ask myself that very question all the time when I was down there, And I think I've finally figured it out. I'm going back home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我以前在那里的时候一直在问自己这个问题，我想我终于明白了。我要回家了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001292_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've been away for so long and it never felt like a good time but.. I think this just might be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我离开了这么久，感觉从来都不太好，但是...我觉得这就是我想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001292_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I felt so bad when I told Tempeh, but I just- I just can't stay here anymore... Says he's getting ready to leave soon too because of it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我告诉丹贝的时候，我感觉很糟糕，但我只是，我只是不能再呆在这里了...因为这个，他也准备马上离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001292_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope he can forgive me.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001292_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was kind of hoping you wouldn't ask that but ok. I was born a Kahn.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本来希望你不要问这个，不过好吧。我生下来就是个大汗帮。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001293_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I know, I know, I don't look it but I was. I didn't get along well with the others and I always felt out of sorts, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我知道，我知道，虽然我看起来不像，但我确实是。我和其他人相处得不好，我总是觉得不舒服，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001293_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So one night when I was 16 I.. just left. Didn't even say goodbye.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我16岁的一天晚上...就离开了，连再见都没说。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001293_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think they understood though. They're a mean bunch but, in the end.. they're family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我认为他们理解。他们是一群卑鄙的人，但最终...他们是一家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001293_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I get that. He's worried about his family, always has been. And I get it, he has a lot of responsibility.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我明白。他很担心他的家人，一直都是。我明白，他有很多责任。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001295_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I just- He's kind of been like a father to me. and I don't want to disappoint him is all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我只是...他对我就像父亲一样。我只是不想让他失望。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001295_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you could come with me? <wink>
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你可以和我一起走？<眨眼>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haha, maybe I should. But I don't think it would work out, I'm still trying to find myself and process everything I've been through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，也许我应该。但我不认为会有结果，我仍然试图找到自己，处理我所经历的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001296_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But maybe if we meet again some time in the future we could.. have a drink together or something?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但也许如果我们在未来的某个时候再见面，我们可以...一起喝一杯？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001296_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, well, they're not as bad as you'd think. Sure, They do a lot of shit but like, who doesnt out here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，他们也没你想的那么糟。当然，他们做了很多坏事，但在这里谁不做呢？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001294_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wanted to find my own path, I wanted to be a part of the world not hide from it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想找到自己的路，我想成为这个世界的一部分，而不是逃避它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001294_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I left, and eventually ended up here. And they were the ones that taught me all I know about explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我离开了，最后来到了这里。也是他们教会了我所有关于爆炸物的知识。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001294_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So they're kind of the reason I'm here working for Tempeh at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这就是我在这里为丹贝工作的原因。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001294_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what about you, what are you going to do now? Where are you headed?
ESP.TRADUIT: 等等，那你呢，你现在打算怎么办？你要去哪里？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm going to settle a score.
Oh, someone got on your bad side? I would never want to be that guy, I know what you're capable of. Who's the guy you're looking for? What'd he do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，有人惹到你了吗？我绝对不想成为那样的人，我知道你的能力。你在找谁？他做了什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm just going where the road leads me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是顺着路的方向走。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I get that. I used to do that a lot with my family too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，我以前也经常和我的家人这样做。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I remember one time, when I was around five my brother said that he wanted to show me the most beautiful thing there is.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我记得有一次，当我五岁左右的时候，我哥哥说他想让我看看世界上最美丽的东西。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We went into the desert, far away from camp one night. We climbed up on a hill and and suddenly he stopped and he pointed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一天晚上，我们离开营地，走进了沙漠。我们爬上了一座小山，突然他停了下来，指了指。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was a cayote nest below in a ridge . The mama had recently had babies.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那是山脊下的一个郊狼巢穴，妈妈最近生了孩子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So the little ones were running around, playing and making that cute noise they make.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以这些小家伙跑来跑去，玩耍，发出可爱的声音。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what made me think of that, but I really miss that feeling of being a child and free to do whatever.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道是什么让我想起那件事的，但我真的很怀念小时候那种可以自由做任何事的感觉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Kind of like what you're doing, I suppose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有点像你在做的事，我想。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb8_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh? I've never been inside the gates, of course, but I've been to Freeside and I have to say, it's not quite how I'd imagined it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？当然，我从来没有进过大门，但我去过自由城，我不得不说，它和我想象的不太一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Not like the rumours paint it out and all.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't much care for those city scroungers, feels like they're the sort to pull a knife on you if you so much as look at em funny.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太喜欢那些城里的乞丐，感觉只要你看他们一眼，他们就会拿刀捅你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So be careful when you're in Freeside, and don't trust anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以你在自由城的时候要小心，不要相信任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb9_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, if you want my advice, head towards Novac. It's this small town up east and north a ways, can't miss it as long as you stay on the road.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，如果你想听我的建议，去诺瓦克吧。是一个东北方的小镇，只要你一直在路上，就不会错过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It got warm beds for hire and good folk too so, it's worth a visit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那里有温暖的床可供租用，也有很好的人，所以值得一游。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I thought I'd be worse off but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我以为我的情况会更糟，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then again I've never been one to dwell on things. But I feel like that is... bad?
ESP.TRADUIT: 话说回来，我从来就不是一个喜欢思考问题的人。但我觉得那是...糟吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Like I was down there for what felt like an eternity but now I can scarcely remember what happened. I don't know. What do you think?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好像我在那里待了很久，但现在我几乎不记得发生了什么。我不知道，你怎么看？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I know is he wore a checkered suit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道他穿格子西装。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm. You know, now that you mention it I think someone like that passed through some time ago. Hard to miss a suit like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯。你知道吗，既然你提到了，我想不久前有个这样的人路过这里，这样的西装很难错过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He went east I think. I hope you find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想他往东去了，我希望你能找到他。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He shot me in the head.
Oh? Seriously? And you survived how? And here I thought I was the luckiest person for surviving that Vault but I guess I've already found my match!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦？真的？你是怎么活下来的？在这里，我以为我是最幸运的人，因为我在避难所里活了下来，没想到还有高手！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Give him one from me then too.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00000bb7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you should see a doctor?
Yeah maybe I should... Come to think of it I think that there are some clinic around the Vegas area.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我应该...我想起来了，在维加斯地区有一些诊所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just might go there after I've packed everything here. Thanks for the advice.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我把这里的东西都收拾好了再去。谢谢你的建议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_0000128f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah that's what Tempeh told me too. I guess I will just have to let it run it's course- "think it over", as he put it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是啊，丹贝也是这么跟我说的。我想我只能让它顺其自然了...用他的话说，“好好考虑一下”。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001290_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, Ok. I see. I think I need to go now though. Thanks for helping me, truly but... Um... Bye!
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，好的，我明白了。不过我想我得走了，谢谢你的帮助，真的，但是...嗯...再见！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Disgust Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaaft_00001291_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to talk about something else
Sure, go ahead, I'm an open book.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05002F75] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasom_00000bb1_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasom_00000bb2_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasom_00000bb3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hey now! Don't come any closer. What is your business here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 喂！别再靠近了。你来这里干什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersfo_00000bd7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I go where ever I want to.
No you you don't, we don't want none of that here. If you're not gonna play nice you have to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，你，你不能，我们不想要这些。如果你不打算和颜悦色，你就得离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersru_00000bda_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Terrifying Presence] Make me, you little worm.
ESP.TRADUIT: [凶神恶煞]让开，你这个小虫子。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, n- no! I- I quit. G- Go on in I won't stop you. I'm out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，不...不！我...我不干了。进去吧，我不会拦你的，我要走了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersru_00000bdb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I will be calm for now. So, can I go in or what?
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我先冷静一下。那我能进去吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, Ok alright fine. Go on in. I won't stop you. But none of that goin' round threatnin' people or you're outta here faster than you can say sorry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，好吧好吧，进去吧，我不会阻止你的。但是不要到处威胁别人，否则你会在道歉之前离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersru_00000bdc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh yeah? No one threatens me and lives. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: <攻击>哦，是吗？没人能威胁我还活下去。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersru_00000bdd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I saw this place in the distance and I wanted to investigate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在远处看到了这个地方，我想调查一下。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm. Ok, fine. I think it be alright if you look around. But don't cause any trouble, ok? Or I'll never hear the end of it...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧，没问题，我想你可以四处看看。不过别惹麻烦，好吗？否则我的耳根就别想清净了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersdi_00000bde_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was sent here by Higgs.
Higgs? I thought the man was long gone. Only took him DAYS to send someone over here! Go on in then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 希格斯？我还以为那人早就死了呢。他只花了几天时间就派人过来了！那就进去吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petershi_00000bd8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We call it Shamble. Kinda fittin' considerin the predicament we're in. We used to mine iron here beneath but then we ran into some trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们称之为乱麻镇，考虑到我们现在的处境，还挺合适的。我们过去在这里开采铁矿，但后来遇到了一些麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersth_00000bea_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you want to know any more you should talk with Tempeh, in the smaller Shack there. He knows all about it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你想知道更多，你应该和丹贝谈谈，在那边的小棚屋里。他什么都知道。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersth_00000bea_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We got our local trader too, Anuah, so talk to him if you're in need of supplies. Sticks around no matter what happens, loyal as he is to Tempeh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们也有当地的商人，阿努阿，如果你需要补给就找他。不管发生什么，他都不会离开，他对丹贝很忠诚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersth_00000bea_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Anuah?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能跟我说说阿努阿吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hm well not much. He dun talk much that one. But he comes from some village to the west of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，没什么。那个人他不怎么说话，但他来自这里西边的某个村庄。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersan_00000be6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Some of the miners says Tempeh found em passed out in the desert n fought off two Deathclaws at the same time to save em, but don't you believe em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一些矿工说，丹贝发现他们昏倒在沙漠里，为了救他们，他同时击退了两个死亡爪，但你不要相信他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersan_00000be6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them's just rumours, what them is. He just signed on and them Tribals got a sense of loyalty's all. Unlike most people out here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那只是谣言而已。他刚签约，他们部落的人都很忠诚，不像这里的大多数人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersan_00000be6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What can you tell me about Tempeh?
He's a good leader, though he doesn't much seem it. He keeps everything well and organized.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个好领导，虽然他看起来不怎么像。他把每件事都安排得井井有条。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterste_00000be8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Pays well too so he's earned the respect of all that's worked for em.
ESP.TRADUIT: 薪水也不错，所以他赢得了所有为他工作的人的尊重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterste_00000be8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But in my opinion he's spreadin hisself too thin. He got his family to care for an all, but he just can help bein too nice the poor feller.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但在我看来，他太不自量力了。还有家庭要照顾，但他忍不住对人太好，可怜的家伙
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterste_00000be8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Me? The name's Peters. I'm actually one of the miners here. Been working for Tempeh for a good while now, ever since I came here from the Hub.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我？我叫彼得斯，其实我也是这里的矿工之一。自从我从中枢市来到这里，就一直在为丹贝工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterswh_00000be9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Drew the short straw I did, so now I'm on guard duty. what with a lot of our real protection leavin on account of the mine closin.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我抽中了短签，所以现在我在站岗。由于矿井关闭，我们失去了很多真正的保护者。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterswh_00000be9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm not cut out for this. I hate having to check everyone comin, and Thamton don't want the responsibility. The bastard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不是这块料。我讨厌检查每个来的人，萨姆顿也不想承担这个责任。那个混蛋。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76peterswh_00000be9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
Well, now that we're packin up, I'll just tag along with Tempeh back to Halloran. Passed through some time ago, and I kinda liked the place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，既然我们都收拾好了，我就跟丹贝一起回哈洛伦。前段时间路过的，我有点喜欢那个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersno_00000bd9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hear they've been havin' trouble with gangs, an' honestly- This guard duty thing aint all that bad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我听说他们一直和帮派有麻烦，说实话...做警卫也没那么糟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersno_00000bd9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I'm thinking I'll see if they need me to help keep the peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我想去看看他们是否需要我帮忙维持治安。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersno_00000bd9_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, keep your nose clean while you're here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，你在这儿的时候别惹麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Peters [05003A93] (mod) Quest : ([05000BBA]Vault76PetersDialogue) Vault76PetersDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76petersvoicetype\vault76pet_vault76petersby_00000bdf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, it's the mine you see. A few days ago, when we used our dynamite to open up a new passage, we found something...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，就是你看到的那个矿井。 几天前，当我们用炸药开辟一条新通道时，我们发现了一些东西...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Turns out we'd blown our way straight into one of them Vaults from before the war.
ESP.TRADUIT: 结果是我们直接炸开了战前的一个避难所。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I went down there with four other miners: Elisa, Clarence, Mathilda and Gabriel. Everything seemed so empty, we thought everyone was gone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我和另外四个矿工一起下到那里，埃莉萨、克拉伦斯、玛蒂尔达和加布里埃尔。一切都显得那么空虚，我们以为所有人都死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All of a sudden we were attacked. They came out of nowhere. I immediately ran out, but when I turned around I was the only one who made it out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 突然间我们遭到了袭击，他们不知从哪里冒出来的。我立即跑了出去，但当我转身时，我是唯一一个逃出来的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The door down was sealed and I found no way in, you'd need to use a terminal down there, but no one here has any such knowledge.
ESP.TRADUIT: 下面的门是密封的，我找不到进去的路，你需要用下面的终端但这里没人会用这些。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So I ran out and locked the door leading down there. I don't want them to burst out and destroy what little town we have.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以我跑出去，锁上了通往那里的门。我不希望他们突然爆发，摧毁我们这个小镇。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem like you've survived the desert for some time... please, would you go down there and find my men?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你似乎在沙漠中生存了一段时间...求你了，你能下去找找我的人吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_00001cf6_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why haven't you been able to continue mining?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你为什么不能继续采矿了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Of course! Take a look at my selection and pick something that calls to you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！看看我选的东西，挑一些你喜欢的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterqu_00002b71_1.ogg

NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterqu_000052c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gladly, I hope you find what your heart seeks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴的希望你能找到你想要的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterqu_000052c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope you get lost in the sand, wanderer. Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不希望你迷失在沙滩上，流浪者。小心点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76cartergo_00002b73_1.ogg

NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76cartergo_000052d1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: May the ground glow before you wanderer.
ESP.TRADUIT: 愿大地在你的漫步前发光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76cartergo_000052d2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading... Vault-Tec Securitron is online. Checking connection with Vault-Tec servers. Success, Vault-Link established.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加载中...避难所科技电子保安已上线。检查与避难所科技服务器的连接。成功，避难所链接已建立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secwater_00002bf5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patrol report was last updated 6409 days ago. A long time without Vault-Tec certified security!
ESP.TRADUIT: 巡逻报告最后更新时间为6409天前。很长时间受避难所科技认证的安全了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secwater_00002bf5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading standard patrol mode. Motoric function: Online. Weapon systems: Online. Initiating patrol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在加载标准巡逻模式。电机功能：在线，武器系统：在线。开始巡逻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secwater_00002bf5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown intruders detected in north-eastern wing. Investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 东北翼发现不明入侵者。正在调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown fungal infestation detected. Consumption of these mushrooms is highly discouraged. Consult a certified physician for proper meal planning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到不明真菌感染。食用这些蘑菇是非常不可取的，向有执照的医生咨询正确的饮食计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a mess! This will require more than just a box of Abraxo to clean up. Cleaning request uploaded to Vault-Tec custodian staff servers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是一团糟！清洁这里需要不止一盒阿伯萨莱。清洁请求上传到避难所科技管理人服务器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到未报告的入口点。正在调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown animal infestation detected. Executing extermination protocol. Please valued Vault resident, stand back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到未知动物侵扰，执行灭绝程序。尊贵的避难所居民，请退后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you want to follow me, sweetie?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't need you to follow me anymore Coco.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不需要你再跟着我了，可可。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to access your inventory Coco.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要看看你的库存，可可。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([05002E2C]Vault76CompanionBrahminQuest) 05002E2C (EDID) EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's all a little hazy but I remember that we didn't see anyone at first.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然有点模糊，但我记得一开始我们并没有看到任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We all assumed that the place was abandoned after some kind of conflict, because of all the bodies lying around and not a living soul in sight.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们都以为这地方在某种冲突后被遗弃了，因为到处都是尸体，看不见一个活人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We were supposed to check the place out so we went down that huge lift... Then, they jumped us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们应该去看看那个地方，所以我们下了那个巨大的升降机...然后，他们突然袭击了我们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It was like they appeared out of thin air. In the ensuing chaos we all ran in different directions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们就像凭空出现的一样。在随后的混乱中，我们都朝不同的方向跑去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This place is a maze so it was more of a gamble than an informed decision. Gabriel and I went the same way but then we got trapped.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个地方就像迷宫一样，所以与其说是明智的决定，不如说是一场赌博。我和加布里埃尔走的是同一条路，但我们被困住了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The last thing I saw was them surrounding him before they knocked me out and dragged me here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我最后看到的是他们围着他然后把我打晕，拖到这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f73_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We're back! I can find my own way from this point on but thank you so much for everything you've done, I- I can't thank you enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们回来了！从现在起，我可以找到我自己的路了，但是非常感谢你所做的一切，我...我不知道怎么感谢你才好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasaf_00002f79_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will never forget this, ever. I'm gonna go join the others now but, come see me before you leave, ok?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我永远不会忘记这件事。我现在要去和其他人汇合了，但是，在你离开之前来见我，好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasaf_00002f79_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't wait to get out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我等不及要离开这里了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasaf_00002f79_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patrol report was last updated 6409 days ago. A long time without Vault-Tec certified security!
ESP.TRADUIT: 巡逻报告最后更新时间为6409天前。很长时间受避难所科技认证的安全了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral
