ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading standard patrol mode. Motoric function: Online. Weapon systems: Online. Initiating patrol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在加载标准巡逻模式。电机功能：在线，武器系统：在线。开始巡逻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到动物巢穴。迅速消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading... Vault-Tec Securitron is online. Checking connection with Vault-Tec servers. Success! Vault-Link established.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加载中...避难所科技电子保安已上线。检查与避难所科技服务器的连接。成功！避难所链接已建立。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Loading standard patrol mode. Motoric function: Online. Weapon systems: Online. Initiating patrol.
ESP.TRADUIT: 正在加载标准巡逻模式。电机功能：在线，武器系统：在线。开始巡逻。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Patrol report was last updated 6409 days ago. A long time without Vault-Tec certified security!
ESP.TRADUIT: 巡逻报告最后更新时间为6409天前。很长时间受避难所科技认证的安全了！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: What a mess! This will require more than just a box of Abraxo to clean up. Cleaning request uploaded to Vault-Tec custodian staff servers.
ESP.TRADUIT: 真是一团糟！清洁这里需要不止一盒阿伯萨莱。清洁请求上传到避难所科技管理人服务器。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat4_00003863_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown intruders detected in north-eastern wing. Investigating.
ESP.TRADUIT: 东北翼发现不明入侵者。正在调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat5_00003864_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown animal infestation detected. Executing extermination protocol. Please valued Vault resident, stand back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到未知动物侵扰，执行灭绝程序。尊贵的避难所居民，请退后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat6_00003865_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Unknown fungal infestation detected. Consumption of these mushrooms is highly discouraged. Consult a certified physician for proper meal planning.
ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到不明真菌感染。食用这些蘑菇是非常不可取的，向有执照的医生咨询正确的饮食计划。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat7_00003866_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到未报告的入口点。正在调查。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat8_00003867_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 检测到动物巢穴。迅速消灭。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Vault-Tec Securitron [050056A6] (mod) Quest : ([050056A9]Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue) Vault76SecuritronWaterTreatmentDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76securitronwatervoicetype\vault76sec_vault76secpat9_00003868_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Why yes! Coco is a small one, but she's the bravest brahmin you've ever laid your eyes on, that's for sure.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然！可可个头很小，但她是你见过的最勇敢的婆罗门，这是肯定的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_000039dc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what with the mine not being operational and all I'm not sure what to do with her. I'd hate to slaughter such a fine animal.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在矿井已经不运作了，我也不知道该拿她怎么办。我可不想宰杀这么好的动物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_000039dc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that small Brahmin outside yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 外面那头小婆罗门牛是你的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh would you now? That right there is a fine animal, I couldn't part with her for less than 500 caps. But she is well worth it I say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢你现在会吗？那是只好动物，我不能以低于500瓶盖的价格和她分开。但我觉得她很值得。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_00003a3c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to buy her from you.
A pleasure doin' business with you friend. Here is her proof of ownership. I'm gonna miss that little two headed buttercup.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很高兴和你的朋友做生意。这是她的所有权证明，我会想念那个两个头的小毛茛的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_00003a3d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. Well, if you change your mind you know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。如果你改变主意了你知道去哪里找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_00003a41_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have the money to spare right now.
I understand. Well, if you change your mind you know where to find me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白。如果你改变主意了你知道去哪里找我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehco_000012af_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is way too much money.
Yes, he's told me everything about how you rescued him. Thank you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，他把你救他的事都告诉我了。谢谢你！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a48_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gabriel is... dead? I can't believe it... this place will never be the same without that man. Thank you for your help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加布里埃尔...死了？我真不敢相信...没有那个人，这地方就完全不一样了。谢谢你的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LIE] I... I found Gabriel. He was... It was so horrible.
ESP.TRADUIT: [说谎]我...我找到了加布里埃尔。他...太可怕了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gabriel is dead? Ah, my poor friend... I was so hoping he'd made it somehow, he always does... or did. Thank you for telling me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 加布里埃尔死了？啊，我可怜的朋友...我真希望他能幸存，他总是能做到...或者...谢谢你告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a54_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry to have to tell you, but Gabriel is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很遗憾地告诉你，加布里埃尔死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm so glad that Elisa is safe once again. I can't thank you enough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很高兴埃莉萨再次安全了。 我对你感激不尽。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a49_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... I was so sure she was alive. I had a feeling and... well it can't be helped, I'm sure you did the best you could. Thank you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢...我很确定她还活着，我有一种感觉...没办法，我相信你已经尽力了。谢谢你！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry but Elisa is no longer with us.
ESP.TRADUIT: 很抱歉，但埃莉萨已经离开我们了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh... are you sure? What am I saying, of course you are. I'm sorry you have to be the bearer of such news. But her passing saddens me greatly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，但我到的时候，埃莉萨已经死了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a53_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [LIE] I'm sorry but Elisa was already dead when I got there.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'll make sure that her family is informed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听到这个消息我很难过。我会通知她的家人的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Mathilda is gone. She was dead when I got there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 玛蒂尔达不在了。我到的时候她已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: He was a good man. Damn the day we found that blasted place. May he rest in peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他是个好人。我们找到那破地方的那天真该死。愿他安息。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry but Clarence is dead.
Yes I think you have! Thank you friend. Even though not everyone made it out alive, I am sure you did everything you could.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你找到了！谢谢你，朋友。虽然不是每个人都活着出来了，但我相信你已经尽力了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, take this. It's a special reward since you managed to rescue both Elisa and Gabriel. It has served me well for many years.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，拿着这个。这是特别的奖励，因为你成功救出了埃莉萨和加布里埃尔。这么多年来一直很好用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will always be welcome in our town, friend. Thank you again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们镇永远欢迎你，朋友。再次感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I have found all of your miners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我已经找到你所有的矿工了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, I guess you have. A shame that no one made it out alive... but thank you for your efforts, you have at least brought me some modicum of peace.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我想你找到了。可惜没人活着出来... 但感谢你的努力，你至少给我带来了一点平静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Times are tough though, especially now with most of my men dead, so I have but a small sum to give. I wish you well in future travels.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但时局艰难，尤其是现在我的大部分手下都死了，所以我只能拿出一小笔钱。祝你在未来的旅行中一切顺利。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a4f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I found all of your miners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我找到你所有的矿工了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, indeed you have. It saddens me that not everyone made it out alive. But thank you for everything. Here, take this modest sum as payment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，你确实找到了。不是每个人都能活着出来，这让我很难过。但感谢你做的一切，给，把这不多的一笔钱作为报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a50_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I hope to see you again in the future. You are always welcome here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望将来能再见到你。这里永远欢迎你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehmi_00003a50_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I found all of your miners.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我找到你所有的矿工了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure, maybe some pre-war defense against monsters?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定，也许是战前对抗怪物的防御？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e06_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know, with all these creatures roaming around now, I don't want to think about what it used to look like.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道，现在有这么多生物在周围游荡，我不想去想它以前是什么样子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e06_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I mean, the war must've killed almost all of them, and the ones that survived are what we see today?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的意思是，战争肯定杀死了几乎所有的人，而那些幸存下来的人就是我们今天看到的样子？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e06_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Listen, all I know is that these crazies in here caught me and brought me to this here cell, so I haven't had time to explore much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 听着，我只知道这些疯子抓住了我把我带到这间牢房，所以我没时间去探索。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e06_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done with questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在已经没有问题了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright well, let's just go. I am very anxious to get out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧好吧，我们走吧。我很想离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know where the others are?
Mathilda I saw running up a flight of stairs, but then I lost sight of her. I never saw where Clarence went though. I hope they're alright.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我看见玛蒂尔达跑上了一段楼梯，但后来就看不见她了，但我没看到克拉伦斯去哪了。我希望他们没事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e08_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Elisa is a different story. I saw them taking her towards the laboratory. I have no idea what they would want with her but I just hope she's still alive.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨则是另一回事。我看到他们带她去了实验室，我不知道他们要她做什么，我只希望她还活着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e08_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, when we first got here it was crickets. We thought everyone gone had just up and left. It was unbelievably quiet.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们刚来的时候非常寂静。我们以为所有人都离开了，那里安静得令人难以置信。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e07_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Then out of nowhere all these crazy people started coming out from the shadows and all hell broke loose. Everyone kinda scattered after that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然后不知从哪里，这些疯子开始从阴影里冒出来，一切都失控了。在那之后所有人都分散了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e07_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess Tempeh remembered how to get out, but these hallways all look the same to me so I just ran. I managed to hide for a while, but then...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我猜丹贝记得怎么出去，但这些走廊在我看来都一样所以我就跑了。我设法藏了一段时间，但后来...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e07_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well they caught me and knocked me out cold. I thought I was a goner, but then I woke up in that cell and that's when you found me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们抓住了我，把我打晕了。我以为我死定了，但当我在牢房里醒来时你找到了我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e07_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to ask you some questions.
Are you sure it is safe to talk here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你确定在这里说话安全吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e0b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm done with questions for now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我现在已经没有问题了。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielq_00003e0c_1.ogg
NPC : Vault-Tec Radiation Suit [0500D8EC] (mod) NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: 来，拿着这个美味的苹果。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have something for you, Coco.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, let me inject you with some Psycho, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，我给你注射点疯狂药，姑娘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think you'll like this potato.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你会喜欢这个土豆的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: This Slasher is going to make you more fierce, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个狂暴针会让你变得更凶猛，姑娘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, let me strap this Stealth Boy on you, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，让我把这个隐身小子绑在你身上，姑娘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.TRADUIT: [快乐的哞哞声与满意的咀嚼声交错]
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I think you'll like this Mutfruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想你会喜欢这个变异果的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, let me inject you with some Med-X.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，我给你注射点吗啡针-X。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, maybe you'd like some Mentats.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，也许你想来点曼他特。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Never mind, I've got nothing to spare right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 算了，我现在没有多余的。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, that's enough for now. Lets go, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，到此为止。走吧，姑娘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here have some Fixer, I think you might need it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里有一些瘾头解，我想你可能需要。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, chew on some Cayote Tobacco, girl.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，嚼点郊狼烟草吧，姑娘。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, girl. Have some Barrel Cactus Fruit.
ESP.TRADUIT: 来，姑娘。吃点巨柱仙人掌果。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have some Honey Mesquite Pods.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, have some Pinyon Nuts, Coco.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: How about some Sunset Sarsaparilla, Coco?
ESP.TRADUIT: 可可，来点夕阳沙士怎么样？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Coco [05002E2A] (mod) Quest : ([050044E0]Vault76CocoDialogueQuestReal) Vault76CocoDialogueQuest EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, read it out for me.
Relaying message: No, no, no! Stupid fucking robot. Don't you get it? This is important. Just record my fucking message will you?
ESP.TRADUIT: 转述信息：不，不，不！该死的蠢货机器人。你不明白吗？这很重要。把我的留言录下来好吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessica, I... I love you. I don't know what happened, it's chaos down here, people screaming... And the bodies... I...
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡，我...我爱你。我不知道发生了什么，这里一片混乱，人们在尖叫...还有尸体...我...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Someone has to decrease pressure in reactor 41 before it blows up. And with all this chaos I think it just has to be me. It's my sector, after all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 必须有人在41号反应堆爆炸前降低压力。在这么混乱的情况下，我想只能是我了。毕竟，这是我的地盘。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If this message gets to you somehow... know that I wanted nothing more than to be with you and the children.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果这条消息不知怎么传到了你的耳朵里...你要知道我只想和你还有孩子们在一起。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hailey, John... Daddy loves you both... So much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 海莉和约翰...爸爸爱你们...非常。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Jessica I... Take care of them will you, baby? I'm going to go now. There is not much time. I... Good bye Jez, I'll miss you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 杰西卡我...照顾好他们，好吗，宝贝？我现在要走了，时间不多了。我...再见杰丝，我会想你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_6.ogg

Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e86_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a recorded message left by head mechanic Robwell regarding the state of the reactor. Would you like me to relay the message?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一份首席机械师罗布韦尔留下的关于反应堆状态的录音。需要我转达口信吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e87_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Very well. How else may I be of assistance?
ESP.TRADUIT: 很好。我还能帮上什么忙吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindmes_00003e89_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: How far gone is this place?
Reactor maintenance is at an all time low. Automatic maintenance protocols are in effect.
ESP.TRADUIT: 反应堆的维护一直处于最低水平。自动维护协议已生效。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindrea_00003e8b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But too few units are delegated to the 'Maintenance Role Server' for vital repairs to be carried out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是委派给“维护角色服务器”进行重要维修的单位太少了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindrea_00003e8b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you know how to get to the Water Treatment Level from here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道从这里怎么去水处理层吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: The way to the water treatment level through the reactor is inaccessible, due to an extreme reactor meltdown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 由于反应堆严重熔毁，无法通过反应堆到达水处理层。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindwat_00003e8d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: A meltdown of this magnitude will engage the automatic reactor lockdown.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这种程度的熔毁会触发反应堆的自动封锁。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindwat_00003e8d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Only the Overseer is authorized to disengage the lockdown. You should head to the Overseer's Office and ask them directly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 只有监督有权解除封锁，你应该去监督的办公室直接问他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindwat_00003e8d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I wish you a very Vault-Tec day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 祝你们避难所科技日愉快。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindgoo_00003e8f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you for your cooperation. What can this maintenance unit help you with?
ESP.TRADUIT: 感谢您的配合。这个维修单位能帮到您什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindnam_00003e91_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your name is not in the list of Vault-Tec approved names.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您的名字不在避难所科技的核准名单上。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindsil_00003e98_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please consider a name change in the immediate future to ensure problem free accomodation here in Vault 26.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请考虑在不久的将来更改名字，以确保我们26号避难所的住宿没有问题。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindsil_00003e98_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I won't tell you my name, rust bucket.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不会告诉你我的名字的，废铁。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Refusal to cooperate with Vault-Tec Automated Systems is illegal. Please state your name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拒绝与避难所科技自动化系统合作是非法的。请报上您的姓名。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindnon_00003e95_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't care, I'm not telling you my name.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不管，我不会告诉你我的名字。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Warning: you are hereby considered a class five felon and this unit will now administer appropriate punishment.
ESP.TRADUIT: 警告：你现在被认为是五级重罪犯，本单位将给予适当的处罚。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindnon_00003e97_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What is this pile of ash here?
Previous user was acting in an unlawful manner. Damaging Vault-Tec property is illegal and grounds for immediate execution.
ESP.TRADUIT: 前一个用户的行为是违法的。破坏避难所的财产是违法的，必须立即执行死刑。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindash_00003e9b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If no other law officials are in the vicinity.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果附近没有其他执法人员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Quest : ([05003E76]Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue) Vault76BlindedRobotDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76blindedrobotvoicetype\vault76bli_vault76blindash_00003e9b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No problem, lets get you back to safety.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没问题，我带你回到安全的地方。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielh_0000429c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll just tell Tempeh that you were already dead when I found you. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我还是告诉丹贝我找到你的时候你已经死了吧。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? Oh... Oh no, this can't be happening!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？噢...哦不，这不可能发生的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielh_0000429b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a few questions first.
Fine, but please, make it quick.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, having lost so many friends already I just don't know. Their passing has been a heavy blow to this entire thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，已经失去了那么多朋友，我就是不知道。他们的离去对整件事是一个沉重的打击。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_0000487a_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if I'll be able to or... even if I want to... I'm sorry, I've been having trouble concentrating after all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道我能不能或者...即使我想...抱歉，经过这一切，我一直无法集中注意力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_0000487a_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Even though family is the only reason I'm out here in the first place, I will have to go back home to Halloran again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然家人是我来到这里的唯一原因，但我还是得回到哈洛伦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_0000487a_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: In a few days time we'll be packin up and leaving this godforsaken place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 再过几天，我们就要收拾行装离开这鬼地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
Well, with both Elisa and Gabriel back I might've had a chance at starting things up again here in the Mojave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 埃莉萨和加布里埃尔都回来了，我或许有机会在莫哈维重新开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_000052b2_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I hear both of them'd rather leave and do other things. I don't blame them though, I'd be the first one out of here if noone done relied on me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我听说他们俩都想离开去做别的事。我不怪他们，如果没有人依赖我，我会第一个离开这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_000052b2_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I can't let these people not have their last pay, not with the hell they had to go through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能让这些人拿不到最后一笔工资，他们经历了这么多磨难。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_000052b2_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be packin up and heading back to Halloran in a few days. Though it's a shame to return empty-handed, I'm sure I'll find something to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 过几天我就收拾东西回哈洛伦去。虽然空手而归有点可惜，但我一定能找到事情做的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_000052b2_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe I'll start that farm I've always been planning on, and I've been missing my wife and children something lately so it might be for the best.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许我会开始经营我一直计划的农场，我最近一直想念我的妻子和孩子，所以这可能是最好的选择。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehno_000052b2_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
Well, I was born and raised in Halloran. I came here to the Mojave looking for an opportunity to feed my family.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在哈洛伦出生长大，我来莫哈维是想找个机会养活我的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehab_000052b3_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: The local mine had been excavated so much you'd have to use a sieve to find as much as a speck of iron.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当地的矿已经被挖得太深了，你要想找到哪怕一点铁都得用筛子。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: And there's a huge power plant right near where I'm from that's left the ground glowing in some places.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我的家乡附近有一个巨大的发电厂，有些地方的地面还在发光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehab_000052b3_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Makes for a dangerous job even digging a ditch if you're not careful. So I started this here excavation, from the ground up.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你不小心的话，即使是挖一条沟渠也是很危险的。所以我从这里开始挖掘，从地面开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehab_000052b3_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a beautiful wife and two lovely children, Georgia and Liam.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我有一个美丽的妻子和两个可爱的孩子，乔治亚和利亚姆。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehab_000052b3_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They make quite a fuss sometimes, they want to travel the world already, just like I did at their age.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们有时会小题大做，他们已经想环游世界了，就像我在他们这个年纪的时候一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was hoping I could return to them with a small fortune so that we might open a shop like they and my wife always dreamed of.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我希望我能带着一笔小钱回到他们身边，这样我们就可以像他们和我妻子一直梦想的那样开一家店。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now I'm unsure if that will happen.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在我不确定这是否会发生了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehab_000052b3_8.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell me a little about yourself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 请简单介绍一下你自己。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I'll just leave you in there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我还是把你留在那儿吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave me in... you can't do that! Oh, please just let me out of here!
ESP.TRADUIT: 把我留在...你不能这么做！求你放我出去吧！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrieln_0000490c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be right back after I've found the key.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我找到钥匙后马上回来。

ESP.ORIGINAL: God bless you stranger. Search the wardens office. Please hurry!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝保佑你，陌生人。搜查监狱长办公室，请快点！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriely_0000490e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, that's me. Does that mean you're gonna get me out of here? Oh please, I can't stand another minute in this hellhole.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，我就是。这意味着你会把我弄出去吗？拜托，我在这鬼地方一分钟也受不了了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielc_00004910_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me out, I'll answer any question you might have!
ESP.TRADUIT: 放我出去，我会回答你的任何问题！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielc_00004910_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have fixed the lamp for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经给你把灯修好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well done resident! You can rest easy knowing that you have done your part for the betterment of our Vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 干得好，居民！您可以放心，因为您已经为我们避难所的改善尽了自己的一份力。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_00004f09_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have proven yourself to be an upstanding and reliable resident. I have administered a maintenance key card for you, for future similar tasks.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您已经证明了自己是一个正直可靠的居民。我给您办理了一张维修密钥卡，以备以后类似的任务使用。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_00004f09_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You will also recieve this monetary sum as compensation for a job well done. The entire Vault-Tec company, appreciates your assistance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您也会得到这笔钱作为出色工作的报酬。整个避难所科技公司，感谢您的帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_00004f09_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: <Lie> I have fixed the lamp for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: <说谎>我已经给你把灯修好了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not sense any difference in power usage. Make sure that the new light bulb is screwed in properly.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有感觉到用电方面有什么不同，确保新灯泡被正确拧入。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76brokenla_00004f0b_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielg_00004f1b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, let's! This place gives me the creeps.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的走吧！这地方让我毛骨悚然。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielg_00004f1c_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielg_00001c1d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will find them, don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到他们的，别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you. Before I was captured and brought to the prison, I saw them taking Elisa down towards the laboratory section of the vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦谢谢你。在我被抓进监狱之前，我看到他们把埃莉萨带到了地下室的实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't want to think about what they have planned for her...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不愿意去想他们对她做了什么计划...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: They locked the normal way down there from the other side, but there's another way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们从另一边把正常的路锁住了，但还有另一条路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Apparently it's possible to reach the water treatment level through the reactor, and then from there gain access to the laboratory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 显然有可能通过反应堆到达水处理层，然后从那里进入实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe the person that ran this place, what do they call it... Overseer? Yeah, maybe they have some valuable information? You could start there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许管理这个地方的人，他们叫什么来着...监督？对，也许他们有一些有价值的信息？你可以从这里开始。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, speaking of which. Here, take this. I found it before they knocked me out. I'm not sure about what it does but I think you should have it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，说起来，来，拿着这个，我在他们把我打晕之前找到的。我不确定它有什么作用，但我认为应该给你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I'm gonna get topside and let Tempeh know that I'm alive. And thank you again. I really do hope you find her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好了，我要去上面告诉丹贝我还活着。再次感谢你，我真心希望你能找到她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00004f20_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will find them, don't worry.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到他们的，别担心。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow, really? That's great! I'll just join her topside then. Thank you friend. For everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇，真的吗？太棒了！那我就到上面去了。谢谢你，朋友。为了这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_000052d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What? What do you mean? You have to save them! They need your help!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？你是什么意思？你必须拯救他们！他们需要你的帮助！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00002fa4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You... You're insane! I won't let you do this!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你...你疯了！我不会让你这么做的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriele_00002fa4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If they're alive I think I might just go down there and kill them myself.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果他们还活着，我可能会亲自下去杀了他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you really care enough to know my name? It seems to me you've only brought death to my vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你真的在乎我的名字吗？在我看来你只是给我的避难所带来了死亡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: For what it's worth, I am Professor Collins. I am the head researcher and scientist in this post-deluge society we've found ourselves in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不管怎么说，我是柯林斯教授。我是我们所处的这个后洪水社会的首席研究员和科学家。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: While I understand your efforts and desire to help your friend Elisa here I must insist that you cease your attempts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然我理解你想要帮助你的朋友埃莉萨的努力和愿望，但我必须坚持要求你停止你的尝试。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: She is of the utmost importance to my research. Therefore I have ordered my men to destroy the door into my laboratory, you will never get in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她对我的研究至关重要。因此，我命令我的人摧毁通往我实验室的门，你永远也进不去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Might I suggest you return to wherever you came from and leave me to conduct my research undisturbed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我建议你回到你来的地方，让我不受干扰地进行我的研究。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Leave and no harm shall come to her. I give you this, my promise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 离开，她就不会受到伤害。我给你这个，我的承诺。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f34_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm &PCName;, may I ask your name?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫&PCName;，请问你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, how courteous of you. I am Professor Collins. Welcome. Though I regret saying, I am in need of some peace and quiet. This is a bad time.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，你真有礼貌。我是柯林斯教授，欢迎。虽然我很抱歉这么说，但我需要一些平静和安宁，现在不是时候。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have seen how unpleasant this place has become, yes? It wasn't always like this you know, before everything got destroyed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你也看到这地方变得多不舒服了，对吧？在一切被毁之前，情况并不总是这样的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have a sneaking suspicion that you are looking for your friend, Elisa. She is alive for now. And I have no intentions of harming her.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我隐约怀疑你在找你的朋友，埃莉萨。她现在还活着，我也没打算伤害她。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you don't back away and allow me to continue my efforts; well, who knows what could happen to her. I'd hate to threaten or hurt anyone.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你不退让，允许我继续努力的话，没人知道她会出什么事。我讨厌威胁或伤害任何人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These are not my intentions you see. It's the other professor. He wants to hurt her, do bad things. He's killed before you know.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，这不是我的本意，是另一位教授。他想伤害她，做坏事。他在你知道之前就被杀了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_5.ogg

NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So please. I beg you, for both our sakes, and for your friend. I think it's best if you just walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以拜托了。求你了，为了我们俩，也为了你的朋友。我觉得你最好还是离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f35_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not wasting time talking to a deranged madman.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我可不想浪费时间跟一个疯子说话。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I, a madman? I have seen how you've conducted yourself here in my home. Slaughtered my family. My friends.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我，一个疯子？我看到了你在我家的表现，屠杀了我的家人，我的朋友们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f37_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Without a care, without a flinch you've killed. If I am the mad one, I wouldn't want to be sane.
ESP.TRADUIT: 毫无顾虑，毫无畏惧，你已经杀了。如果我疯了，我可不想保持理智。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f37_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I understand you. We attack first, you respond. The difference is that this here is our home. You came here, we did not force you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我理解你，我们先进攻，你们反击。不同的是，这里是我们的家，你来这里，不是我们强迫你的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f37_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Same with your friend Elisa here. They came here, and started stealing, looking and poking and prodding our homes. What would you have us do?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的朋友埃莉萨也一样。他们来到这里，开始偷窃，搜查，拨弄我们的家。你想让我们怎么做？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f37_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your coming here was a mistake. I think you'd do best if you just left. And never come back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你来这儿是个错误。我觉得你最好还是离开吧，再也不要回来了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f37_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, is that the name of your friend here? The one thing I need, and you want to take it from me. No, I can't allow that I'm afraid.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，这是你朋友的名字吗？我需要的东西，你却想夺走。不，恐怕我不能允许。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. She is safe here, with me. Out there, outside these walls, there is nothing. Only dread and silence.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，她在这里很安全，和我在一起。外面，在这些墙外，什么都没有。只有恐惧和沉默。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Professor Taylor knew. He was brilliant, but alone. Left without his kin. That, my newfound friend, can turn anyone mad.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰勒教授知道。他才华横溢，但孤独，离开了他的亲人。这，我的新朋友，能让任何人发疯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And even though he knew the risks, he was willing to conduct the test without the necessary precautions. It became our downfall, but it was worth it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 即使他知道有风险，他还是愿意在没有必要的预防措施的情况下进行测试。这成了我们失败的原因，但这是值得的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Knowledge is not free. Like the well of Mímir; you must sacrifice something to get it. I have done my sacrifices.
ESP.TRADUIT: 知识不是免费的。就像密米尔之泉，你必须牺牲一些东西才能得到它。我已经做出了牺牲。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_5.ogg

NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f38_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You walk in here yet you have no idea. A stranger. An outsider. Someone expendable, I gather. Just like Elisa here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你走进来却什么都不知道。一个陌生人，一个外来者，我认为是一个可以牺牲的人。就像埃莉萨一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is Vault 26, were it not obvious what with those exact numbers printed on every door and jumpsuit in here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是26号避难所，不是很明显吗，每扇门上都印着精确的数字，连身衣上也印着。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I guess you're more interested in what became of this place? That, my curious friend, is a long story.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我猜你更感兴趣的是这地方后来怎么样了？我好奇的朋友，这可说来话长了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But suffice to say, it was a in a moment of anger, sorrow and confusion that it all went up in flames. Vault-Tec had not anticipated human emotions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我只想说，在那愤怒、悲伤和困惑的时刻，一切都付之一炬。避难所科技没有预料到人类的情感。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Taylor was a brilliant man. But after his wife died giving birth to a stillborn, the fate of the vault was sealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 泰勒是个才华横溢的人。但在他的妻子死于死产后，避难所的命运就注定了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You see; experimentation with substances spread throughout the water supply was one of our main objectives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看，我们的主要目标之一是在整个供水系统中进行物质实验。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That; along with the advancement of robotics and an ample supply of weapons, resulted in what you now see before you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个。随着机器人技术的进步和武器的充足供应，导致了你现在看到的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_7.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But please. Do not judge us. We are but a product of our mind. This, all this, is the product of the mind of Professor Taylor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是请，不要评判我们，我们不过是我们思想的产物。这些，所有这些，都是泰勒教授思想的产物。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_8.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But now I have to ask you to leave. I need your friend, as much as it saddens me to admit it. I need to make things right again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但现在我得请你离开了。我需要你的朋友，尽管承认这一点让我很难过。我得让一切重回正轨。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f39_9.ogg
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will find you, and I will kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会找到你，然后我会杀了你。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76intercom_00004f47_1.ogg
NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral

ESP.ORIGINAL: I think I can take it from here. Don't worry, I know the way.
ESP.TRADUIT: 接下来就交给我吧。别担心，我认得路。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielg_00004fa7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if you've found the others but... I hate to ask you, you've already done so much. But please. I can't do it myself. I'm no fighter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道你有没有找到其他人但...我不想问你，你已经做了这么多了。但是拜托了，我自己做不到，我不是战士。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielg_00004fa7_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your complaint has been logged. The latest cleaning log was completed 6412 days ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 您的投诉已记录在案。最近的清理日志是在6412天前完成的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_00005228_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have notified our Vault-Tec custodian staff and they are now on their way. Thank you for your complaint.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我已经通知了避难所科技的管理人员，他们正在赶来的路上。感谢您的投诉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_00005228_2.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 祝您有一个非常棒的避难所科技日！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Valued Vault-Tec resident. I have been unable to contact maintenance staff for 6412 days. Emergency protocols have been engaged.
ESP.TRADUIT: 宝贵的避难所科技居民，我已经6412天没有联系到维修人员了。已启动紧急协议。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maintenance tasks have been delegated to every resident. You have been given the task of: Replacement of broken light bulb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 维修任务已分配给每位居民。你的任务是：更换坏掉的灯泡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Locate a Vault-Tec lightbulb and replace the broken light bulb at the end of the rightmost aisle in the library.
ESP.TRADUIT: 找到一个避难所科技灯泡，并更换图书馆最右边过道尽头的破损灯泡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Upon completion you will recieve the customary monetary compensation for your service.
ESP.TRADUIT: 工作完成后，您将获得按惯例支付的服务报酬。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thank you and have a wonderful Vault-Tec day!
ESP.TRADUIT: 谢谢您并祝您避难所科技日愉快！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Infotron [05005224] (mod) Quest : ([05005222]Vault76DialogueInfotron) Vault76 Infotron Dialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76infotronvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76infotron_0000522c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, just don't leave me down here.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielw_00005280_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielw_00005281_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ok, but don't be too long. I don't like to be by myself in this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好的，但是不要太久。我不喜欢一个人待在这里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisawai_00005286_1.ogg

NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisawai_00005287_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need you to keep waiting here.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisawai_00005289_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll be here when you get back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你回来的时候我就在这。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : [0007C17D] (ID) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrielw_0000528b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need to look at what you're carrying.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisainv_0000528d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Alright, I can always use a little more ammo.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我可以再多用点弹药。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisainv_00000b87_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrieli_0000528f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me take a look at your inventory.
So what do you have for me?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabrieli_00001c1c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Let me take a look at your inventory.
What? Oh, oh no! This can't be happening!
ESP.TRADUIT: 什么？噢，哦不！这不可能发生！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005299_1.ogg

ESP.TRADUIT: 加布里埃尔，准备受死吧。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, it's a small place. You'd find it out west and south a ways. Nice enough place I suppose but there ain't much mining work to be had.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，那是个小地方，你能在西南边找到它。我想这地方不错，但没有太多的采矿工作。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_1.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: Though Amy, that's my wife, has been tellin me of the most peculiar things in her letters as of late.
ESP.TRADUIT: 虽然艾米，也就是我的妻子，最近一直在她的信里告诉我一些最奇怪的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_2.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: For one thing, She's sayin' that the local gang has been increasing in numbers and are causing all kinds of trouble 'round town.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一方面，她说当地帮派的人数越来越多，在镇上制造了各种麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_3.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: And that some kind of church has been built close by recently. That's not half of it tough.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最近附近又建了一座教堂。这还远远不够。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_4.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: She's been tellin me of Deathclaw sightings near the old plant. And Old Tom's been swearing to honest God he heard one talk while out one evening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她一直跟我说在老工厂附近看到了死亡爪。老汤姆对着上帝发誓，他有天晚上出去时听到有人说话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_5.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know what to believe, but she's not one to be joking about these things. I'm telling you, her letters have got me mighty spooked.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道该相信什么，但她不是那种会拿这些事开玩笑的人。我跟你说，她的信把我吓坏了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_6.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: They've actually got me thinking of returning home earlier than expected. Maybe this was the sign I needed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，他们让我开始考虑比预期更早回家。也许这就是我需要的信号。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehha_000052ba_7.wav

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was heading towards Nipton when I saw this place in the distance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我正朝尼普顿走的时候在远处看到了这个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah I see. Well Niptons's a bone town these days I'm sorry to say. I would steer clear of that place if I were you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，原来如此。很遗憾，尼普顿现在是个骨头镇。如果我是你，我会避开那个地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterni_000052be_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But of course you're welcome to stay here in Shamble if you need. It aint much upon the earth, especially with the troubles we've been having.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，如果你需要的话，欢迎你留在乱麻镇。这在地球上不算什么，尤其是考虑到我们遇到的麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterni_000052be_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Speaking of, you look like someone with spirit's favor, maybe you should talk with Tempeh, he can explain more in detail.
ESP.TRADUIT: 说起来，你看起来像是受到了精灵的青睐，也许你应该和丹贝谈谈，他可以解释得更详细。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterni_000052be_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He stays in the smaller one of our two shacks. And If you're in need of supplies, I'm your soul.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他住在我们两间小屋中较小的那间。如果你需要补给，我就是你的灵魂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterni_000052be_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interesting. It seem the spirits have looked upon us, at last. We've actually been looking for someone like you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣。看来精灵们终于眷顾我们了，其实我们一直在寻找像你这样的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterha_000052bf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should talk with Tempeh if youre interested in lending a hand. He lives in the small shack over there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你有兴趣帮忙，你应该和丹贝谈谈。他住在那边的小棚屋里。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterha_000052bf_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if you want to barter, you talk to me. I have plenty of supplies that might help you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果你想交易，你得跟我说。我有很多物资可以帮到你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterha_000052bf_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just happened upon this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只是偶然发现了这个地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. I'll repect your wishes. But if you're looking for a job you should head into the small shack behind me and talk with Tempeh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解，我会尊重你的意愿。但如果你在找工作，你应该到我身后的小棚屋去找丹贝谈谈。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterno_000052c0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: He can explain more. If you're looking to trade though, just gimme a shout.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他可以解释更多。如果你想交易，就喊我一声。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterno_000052c0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is our camp. We're in the mining business you see and underneath us we have spun a web of tunnels, the roots of our city and our lifeblood.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是我们的营地。你看，我们是从事采矿业的，在我们脚下，我们编织了一个隧道网，这是我们城市的根基，也是我们的命脉。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterth_000052d6_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My job is to sell and move what the earth gave to different places around the City Glow, or Vegas as you say.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的工作是把地球上的东西卖给辉光城周围的不同地方，或者像你说的维加斯。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterth_000052d6_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But because of our recent problems we haven't been able to harvest the rock for a while so business is not exactly boomin' right now, though.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是由于我们最近的问题，我们已经有一段时间无法收获岩石了，所以现在的生意并不是很好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterth_000052d6_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You don't seem to speak like most around here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你说话不像这里的大多数人。
