ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I come from the west of here. I used to live on the inside, a small isolated community called Ahoe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我是从西边来的。我曾经住在里面，一个叫阿霍的与世隔绝的小社区。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76cartersp_000052d4_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: We need not the outside so we did not employ their tounge. Now though I have lived on the outside for a long time, so I got better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我们不需要外界，所以我们没有使用他们的语言。现在虽然我在外面住了很长时间，所以我好多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76cartersp_000052d4_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That is a story of bone my friend.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我的朋友，这是一个关于骨头的故事。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterwh_000052d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I got married. I was so lost in the sand, I could not believe my eyes, every day was like paradise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我结婚了。我在沙子里迷失了，我不敢相信我的眼睛，每天都像天堂一样。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterwh_000052d5_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But one day the sickness that claims a lot of our people struck her. She grew weak, wouldn't eat and spew fourth her lifeblood and she left her body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但有一天，一种夺走我们很多人生命的疾病袭击了她。她变得虚弱，不吃东西，吐出她的血液，她离开了自己的身体。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterwh_000052d5_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I could not look at Ahoe anymore, all I saw was her spirit calling me invoking closemindedness and bitterness. I told my family and I left.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不能再看阿霍了，我只看到她的灵魂在呼唤我，唤起我的亲密和痛苦。我告诉了家人，然后离开了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterwh_000052d5_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It has been more than 10 years. Now I understand why she had to leave, and I am at peace. But I prefer the outside now. I cannot go back.
ESP.TRADUIT: 已经10多年了。现在我明白了她为什么要离开，我也平静了。但我现在更喜欢外面，我回不去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterwh_000052d5_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha, I would say that Coco is her own master. The strongest spirit there ever was in an animal that one has.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，我会说可可是她自己的主人。动物所拥有的最强大的精神。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterco_000052c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But no. She belongs to Tempeh, but I hear he is unsure of what to do with her, with our lifeblood in the ground cut off.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但是不，她属于丹贝，但我听说他不知道该拿她怎么办，因为我们在地下的命脉被切断了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterco_000052c8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I care for the bigger one, over there, Aruha. She has been my companion on many long travels over the earth.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我喜欢那个大的，在那边，阿鲁哈。在地球上的许多长途旅行中，她一直陪伴着我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterco_000052c8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Is that small Brahmin over there yours?
ESP.TRADUIT: 那边那头小婆罗门牛是你的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
Tempeh has told me of his plans, that he wants to leave, and my road follows his, for the time being.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹贝告诉了我他的计划，他想离开，我的路也暂时跟着他走。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterdo_000052c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: So, I will also leave these grounds behind. What happens after, will happen, and all other thoughts serve no purpose.
ESP.TRADUIT: 所以，我也会把这片土地抛在脑后。之后发生的事情，将会发生，所有其他的想法都是徒劳的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterdo_000052c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I am content however, these veins have lost their blood and it is time to move on.
ESP.TRADUIT: 然而我很满足，这些血管已经失去了血液，是时候继续前进了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Anuah [05003CAB] (mod) Quest : ([05002B6E]Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue) Vault76CrankyCarterDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76crankycartervoicetype\vault76cra_vault76carterdo_000052c9_3.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005323_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Take care, and thanks again for everything.
ESP.TRADUIT: 保重，再次感谢你所做的一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005324_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'll see you around. Maybe in Vegas, who knows! Take care.
ESP.TRADUIT: 回头见。也许在拉斯维加斯，谁知道呢！保重。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005325_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to ask you something else.
Sure, I got time. Tempeh says we won't be packing up for some time yet I don't think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当然，我有时间。丹贝说我们一段时间内不会收拾行李，但我不这么认为。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005349_1.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sounds good, what's on your mind?
ESP.TRADUIT: 听起来不错，你在想什么？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What, you don't think I can rough up some drunk farmer? I know I look sweet and all but I can be feisty!
ESP.TRADUIT: 怎么，你觉得我打不过一个喝醉酒的农民吗？我知道我看起来很可爱，但我也很有活力！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005345_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Truth is, anything's better than staying in the mining business.
ESP.TRADUIT: 其实，做任何事都比留在采矿业强。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005345_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Just look at Quarry Junction, I hear they've been having trouble too. Deathclaws, if you can believe that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看采石场，我听说他们也遇到了麻烦。死亡爪，如果你相信的话。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005345_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But they say that there's a lot of work to be had up in Vegas. You wouldn't know of anyone hiring there, would you, seeing as you've been around?
ESP.TRADUIT: 但他们说拉斯维加斯还有很多工作能做。你在那待过，应该知道有人在招人吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005345_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have never been to New Vegas.
But you've seen it right? The shining beacon in the distance? I hope I can get in some day and try my luck, but I just don't have the caps for it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但你见过，对吧？远处闪亮的灯塔？我希望有一天我能进去试试我的运气，但我只是没有瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005346_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But from what i can understand you can get yourself some kind of fake pass with the right connections to get in. You didnt hear that from me though!
ESP.TRADUIT: 但据我所知，你可以通过合适的关系弄个假通行证进去。不过你不是听我说的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005346_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe The Kings could need some help.
The Kings? I don't know aren't they some type of gang?
ESP.TRADUIT: 猫王帮？我不知道，他们不是什么帮派吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005347_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I want to make my mark sure but I don't think I got that, you know? I think I'll settle for some regular work for now, boots to the ground and all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想留下我的印记，但我觉得我做不到，你知道吗？我想我现在就满足于做一些固定的工作，脚踏实地。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005347_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
You know what, I have no idea. I've had my fill of mining I can tell you that much. But farming life just ain't for me either, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，我也不知道。我可以告诉你，我已经挖够矿了。但农场生活也不适合我，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005326_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd rather do something with some action, like you do! I have some friends that do bouncing gigs in vegas, maybe I could do something like that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我宁愿做点有动作的事，像你一样！我有一些朋友在维加斯做弹跳表演，也许我也可以做类似的事情。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005326_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Or- or I could sign on as a caravan guard or something, yeah!
ESP.TRADUIT: 或者，或者我可以去当一名商队警卫什么的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005326_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers could always use the help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者总是需要帮助的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Followers? Oh, those doctor guys?
ESP.TRADUIT: 天启追随者？哦，那些医生？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005348_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have no medical know how whatsoever but if they're looking for people that can do other less brainy things I don't see why not.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我没有任何医学知识，但如果他们在寻找可以做其他不那么聪明的事情的人，我觉得没有什么不可以的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005348_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know what, I might go and see. They've always struck me as people that want to do good just for the sake of it, and I admire that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这样吧，我可能会去看看。他们给我的印象一直是，他们是为了做好事而做好事的人，我钦佩这一点。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005348_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It's definately a rare thing these days.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005348_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't know if I can picture you as a caravan guard.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道能不能把你想象成一个商队守卫。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, I've never tried it, so who knows?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: All I know is that while being locked up in that cell I said to myself over and over, that if I ever made it out of there
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只知道当我被关在那间牢房里的时候我一遍又一遍地对自己说，如果我能从那里出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would try something new, see new places, meet new people. I just feel like I want to get out on the road, see what's out there, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我会尝试新的事物，去新的地方，认识新的人。我只是觉得我想出去走走，看看外面有什么，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find myself some pretty girl somewhere far away or something, like, anythings possible! You know what I mean?
ESP.TRADUIT: 给自己找个漂亮的女孩，去个很远的地方，什么都行！你懂我的意思吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess staring death straight into the face it all it takes to make you appreciate life just a little more, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想直面死亡就能让你更加珍惜生命，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And you? Got someone waiting for you at home?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005341_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That's nice. Sure I mean, I've had my share of romances but I think I'm ready for something a bit more real, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这很好。当然，我是说，我也有过浪漫的经历，但我想我已经准备好开始一段更真实的恋情了，你知道吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005342_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I got my horrible traumatic experiences to thank for that!
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想这多亏了我可怕的创伤经历！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005342_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Settling down will have to wait. First I'd like to make my mark on the world. First the world and then someone to make my world. Kinda smart, huh?
ESP.TRADUIT: 安定下来还得再等等。首先，我想在这个世界上留下我的印记。先拥有这个世界然后有人来创造我的世界，有点聪明，是吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005342_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I understand. With a life like yours I bet it get even more difficult than it already is right?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我理解。像你这样的生活，我敢打赌会比现在更困难，对吧？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005343_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But something tells me you'll find the right one, when and if you want to.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但直觉告诉我，只要你愿意，你会找到对的那个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005343_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I feel like I'm ready for something real now. No more fooling around, this is the new me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我觉得我已经准备好开始真正的生活了。不再胡闹了，这是全新的我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005343_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As soon as I get out of here and find someplace where I can settle.
ESP.TRADUIT: 等我离开这里，找个能安顿下来的地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005343_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I dont have anyone. But if you'd like to meet over dinner sometime maybe I could?
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我没人。但如果你愿意找个时间一起吃晚饭，也许我可以？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ha ha. Well, aren't you the sweetest thing. You know, I think I would like that, but something tells me that the settling life just ain't your thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哈哈，你真是太贴心了。你知道吗，我想我很乐意，但我觉得安定的生活不是你的菜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005344_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if we ever meet again sometime in the future when we both feel up for it, I'd gladly take you up on that.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果我们在未来的某个时候再见面，我们都有兴趣的的话，我很乐意接受你的邀请。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005344_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My ma and pa were both farmers so I know how it is believe me. Even though I love them both and my time back at the ranch, I just couldn't stay.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我爸爸妈妈都是农民，所以我知道这是怎么回事，相信我。虽然我爱他们俩，也爱我在牧场的时光，但我就是呆不下去了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I felt like I was growing roots myself just chorin' day in and out, I just had to leave.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我感觉自己就像扎了根一样，日复一日地唱着歌，我不得不离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533a_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: My brother takes care of them so they're doing all right. He always was more of a homebody anyway, you know?
ESP.TRADUIT: 我哥哥照顾他们，所以他们过得很好。反正他本来就是个宅男，你懂吗？
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533a_3.ogg

NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533a_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, really? I know of it, My pa always spoke well of the place, said it always had the most reliable people.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哦，真的吗？我知道这个地方，我爸爸一直说这个地方很好，说那里总是有最可靠的人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I've never been so I wouldn't know but maybe it's a good place to settle down one day.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我从来没有去过，所以我不知道，不过也许有一天那里会是一个安顿下来的好地方。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wow! I've heard so much of the place but would you believe, I've never been. Not even in Freeside.
ESP.TRADUIT: 哇！我听说过很多关于那个地方的事，但你相信吗，我从来没去过，连自由城都没有。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Because the caps you'd need to have on you to get in to Vegas proper I haven't even seen in my wildest dreams.
ESP.TRADUIT: 因为想进入维加斯需要的瓶盖我做梦都没见过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw man, I bet you've seen some cool shit inside of there! The booze, the gambling, the women! Ah, when the time comes, when the time comes.
ESP.TRADUIT: 天啊，我打赌你在里面见过一些很酷的东西！酒，赌博，女人！啊，等时机成熟，等时机成熟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533d_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The place with the Giant green gecko out front? I always wondered who'd build a monument to those nasty little things, it makes no sense.
ESP.TRADUIT: 门口有个绿色大蜥蜴的地方吗？我一直在想，谁会为这种讨厌的小东西建一座纪念碑，这太不合理了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533e_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I hear it is a nice place, though. Cozy in a way. Some trader passing through the other week said that they had some trouble lately too.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我听说那是个好地方，还算舒服。前几周路过的一些交易员说，他们最近也遇到了一些麻烦。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533e_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But I'm guessing that's all sorted out now then.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过，我想现在已经解决了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000533e_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, I get it. It's nice to be able to drift around but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我明白了。能够四处漂泊很好，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005340_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It can get stressful though, not knowing when's your next meal, if you'll find shelter for the night, that sorta thing.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这也会让你感到压力，不知道你的下一顿饭是什么时候，不知道你是否能找到过夜的地方，诸如此类。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005340_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I used to be like that when I was younger, after I left home.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我年轻的时候也是这样，在我离开家之后。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005340_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I still think about the nights looking up into the stars beside some campfire. Good times.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我仍然会想起那些在篝火旁仰望星空的夜晚，好时光。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_00005340_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Honestly? I'm still terrified. Like not one minute go by without these awful memories flashing in my head.
ESP.TRADUIT: 老实说？我还是很害怕。这些可怕的记忆每时每刻都在我脑海里闪过。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tempeh says it's part of the process so I guess I just got live with it for a while.
ESP.TRADUIT: 丹贝说这是过程的一部分，所以我想我只能忍受一段时间。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The things they said and did, my God you wouldn't believe. I thought I knew crazy but now, whew.
ESP.TRADUIT: 他们说的话和做的事，我的天，你不会相信的。我以为我知道我疯了，但是现在，哟。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You'd be surprised how watching someone banging their head against a wall while screaming that they'd just love to kill you can affect you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你会惊讶的发现，看着一个人一边用头撞墙，一边尖叫着要杀了你，会对你产生多大的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But anyway. I'm out now and there's no use thinking about it. And I got you to thank for it so, at risk of being annoying: thanks again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但无论如何，我已经出来了，想这些也没用了。我还得感谢你，所以，冒着烦人的风险，再次感谢你。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You know, lately I've been so happy just from feeling the sun on my face. I used to hate how warm it gets out here, but now, not so much.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道吗，最近我感觉阳光照在脸上就很开心。我以前讨厌外面这么热，但现在，不那么讨厌了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [05005C0E] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriela_0000534c_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Hand over Elisa and I won't kill you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 把埃莉萨交出来，我就不杀你。

ESP.ORIGINAL: How crude. But an effective and understandable threat, were not the situation such as it is. I cannot allow myself to be stopped now, I am too close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 多么粗鲁。但如果不是现在的情况，这是一种有效的、可以理解的威胁。我不能让自己现在被阻止，我已经太接近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005944_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I will however ask you one last time. Leave, and do not interfere. This is all I ask. Just walk away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过我最后再问你一次。离开，不要干涉。这是我唯一的请求，走开就好。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005944_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you choose to enter my laboratory and prove that words cannot make you see reason, I will have to resort to brute force, though it shames me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你选择进入我的实验室，证明言语不能让你明白道理，我将不得不诉诸暴力，尽管这让我感到羞愧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005944_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: On second thought, I think I'll just see myself out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想了想，我想我还是看看自己能不能出去吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: That would be preferable. I must ask you to not enter my laboratory unless you want repercussions. I cannot allow you to stop me now, I'm too close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那就更好了。我必须要求你不要进入我的实验室，除非你想受到惩罚。我不能让你现在阻止我，我离成功太近了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005945_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But all of these people... They deserve better. They deserve to be saved from all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 但所有这些人...他们应该得到更好的，他们应该被从这一切中拯救出来。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005583_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Professor, this just isn't right. I don't think you're ill intentioned, but this is wrong.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教授，这是不对的。 我不认为你居心不良，但这是错误的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your opinion does not concern me. I do this because it is the right thing to do.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败] 你的看法与我无关。我这么做是因为这是正确的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594d_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sometimes we have to make difficult decisions to do what is right.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有时候，为了做正确的事，我们不得不做出艰难的决定。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594d_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This is not very nice of you in my opinion.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在我看来，你这样做不太好。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you even need Elisa for?
Ah, how refreshing it is to be conversing with someone interested in the whys and the wherefores. My collegues lost that trait many years ago.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊，能和一个对原因和理由感兴趣的人聊天是多么令人振奋啊。我的同事们在很多年前就失去了这种特质。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: As for the answer to your posed question, I want to save this vault. I believe Elisa to be the key to my progress.
ESP.TRADUIT: 至于你问题的答案，我想保住这个避难所。我相信埃莉萨是我进步的关键。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I suppose Elisa is not special, at least as far as her genetic makeup go. But she is untouched by the accident that befell this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想埃莉萨并不特别，至少就她的基因构成而言。但她并没有受到发生在这个地方的事故的影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I need someone from the outside to find a long since needed cure. I need her. It is not my intention to bring her harm.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我需要外面的人帮我找到久违的治愈方法。我需要她，我无意给她带来伤害。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But if her life needs to be sacrificed for the betterment of the lives of the many people here, so be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但如果需要牺牲她的生命来改善这里许多人的生活，那就牺牲吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The need of the one does not outweigh the need of the many.
ESP.TRADUIT: 一个人的需要并不比多数人的需要更重要。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005946_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I guess I understand. I will allow you to continue.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我想我明白了，我会允许你继续的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: It gladdens me that you understand. Though it is a sad thing, her suffering shall be the salvation of many generations to come.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你能理解，我真高兴。虽然这是一件令人悲伤的事情，但她的苦难将会拯救未来许多代人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d39_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are free to go. I must however warn you not to enter my laboratory, if you do not want to experience swift repercussions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以自由行动。但是我必须警告你如果你不想迅速尝到恶果就不要进入我的实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d39_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Farewell outsider. I wish you success in your future endevours.
ESP.TRADUIT: 别了，外来者。祝你在未来的事业中取得成功。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d39_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I do not agree. She is innocent. She didn't destroy this vault.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不同意！她是无辜的，她没有摧毁这个避难所。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I agree. She is innocent. But so is everyone else here. They are only slaves to their basic instincts. But I can save them, with her help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我同意。她是无辜的，但这里的其他人也是如此，他们只是自己本能的奴隶。但有她的帮助，我能救他们。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, she didn't destroy this vault. We did. It does not bring me joy, but she can singlehandedly save everyone here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，她没有毁掉这个避难所，是我们毁掉的。虽然不能给我带来欢乐，但她可以独自拯救这里的每一个人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b0_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I would gladly undergo the procedure if I did not know that it would yield no fruit. I am sorry for your friend. But the lives of many are at stake.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果我不知道这样做不会有结果，我愿意接受这个过程。我为你的朋友感到遗憾，但许多人的生命危在旦夕。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b0_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I must ask you to leave now. If you choose to enter my laboratory inspite of my warnings... well I'll just have to retaliate.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我必须得请你离开了。如果你不顾我的警告进入我的实验室...那我只能反击了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b0_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: These people are beyond saving. Let her go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这些人已经无法挽救了。让她走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: And how would you know? Do you have any idea how this sickness functions? I thought not. If you can add a nucleotide you can also remove it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你怎么知道？你知道这种病是怎么回事吗？我认为不。如果你可以添加一个核苷酸，你也可以删除它。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d3b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't expect you to understand. After all, I have been working on a cure for as long as I can remember now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不指望你能理解。毕竟从我记事起我就一直在研究治愈方法。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d3b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I don't expect you to understand. But I expect you to allow me to do what is right. These people need me. They need help.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我不指望你能理解，但我希望你能允许我做正确的事。这些人需要我，他们需要帮助。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d3b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do not enter my laboratory, unless you want to experience repercussions.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不要进入我的实验室，除非你想承受后果。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_00005d3b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Well. The genetics need to be pure to create a baseline... Generations of radiation exposure.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 好。基因必须是纯粹的，才能创造一个基准...几代人的辐射暴露。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594b_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: By God you are right, how could I not think of this? Any trace of genetic mutation and my experiments will not be of any use whatsoever!
ESP.TRADUIT: 上帝作证，你是对的，我怎么会没想到这一点呢？任何基因突变的痕迹，我的实验都将毫无用处！ !
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594b_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I... I do not know what to say.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594b_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no hope for a cure. There are no more people with pure genetics; save for a select few from some Vault, God knows how far away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 没有治愈的希望了。 再也没有拥有纯正基因的人了，除了来自天知道有多远的某个避难所的少数人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594b_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have made me see reason. I will let you enter. Please take your friend and leave this accursed place. I must put an end to this madness.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你让我意识到了错误。我会让你进去的，请带着你的朋友离开这个被诅咒的地方。我必须结束这种疯狂。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594b_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But Elisa is not untouched. She has been mutated by the radiation, like everyone else out there.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但埃莉萨并不是没有受到任何影响。她已经被辐射变异了，就像外面的所有人一样。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What you think is irrelevant. The specimen does not need to be perfectly healthy, as long as their genetic makeup is untouched.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的想法无关紧要。样本不需要完全健康，只要它们的基因组成不受影响。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, I need her to save the many lives here. It brings me no joy, but she has a much too imporant role to fill for me to allow her depature.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，我需要她来拯救这里的许多生命。这不会给我带来快乐，但她的角色太重要了，我不能让她离开。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_0000594c_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wouldn't the fact that her DNA might be mutated would invalidate your genetic experiments?
ESP.TRADUIT: [医学]你怎么知道她没有被污染？那样的话，你的实验不就无效了吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Thanks, I'll use it right away.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriels_00006062_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, thank you. I needed that.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Gabriel [0500399F] (mod) Quest : ([050042A2]Vault76DialogueGabriel) Vault76DialogueGabriel EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76gabrielvoicetype\vault76dia_vault76gabriels_00001c24_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You are hurt. Here, take a stimpak.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你受伤了。给，用个治疗针。
谢谢，你真是我的救命恩人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasti_00006069_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, just what I need, thank you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisasti_00000b88_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCESS] You... you're right. I can't do this, she did not volunteer for this. No one did...
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功] 你... 你说得对。我不能这么做，这不是她自愿的。没人...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Please, take her far away from this hell. She does not deserve this fate. I will let you enter my laboratory.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拜托，带她离开这个地狱，她不应该得到这种命运。我会让你进入我的实验室。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b2_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Her life is not yours to sacrifice professor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 她的生命不是由你来牺牲的，教授。

ESP.ORIGINAL: No. These people here did not ask for this either. THEY are the innocent ones, condemned to roam this accursed place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，这里的这些人也不想要这样。他们是无辜的人，被判处在这个被诅咒的地方游荡。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If one innocent has to be sacrificed, even by my hand, for the salvation of all. So be it.
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果要牺牲一个无辜的人，哪怕是用我的手，来拯救所有人。那就这么办吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Professor Collins [0500652E] (mod) Quest : ([05004F2D]Vault76LastBossDialogue) Vault76LastBossDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76lastbossvoicetype\vault76las_vault76confront_000068b3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But she didn't ask for this. Let her go.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但这不是她想要的。让她走吧。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here, I think you need this Radaway.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给，我觉得你需要这个辐特宁。
谢谢，你真是我的救命恩人！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisarad_00007239_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Aw, just what I need, thank you!
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisarad_0000723a_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Lets see if we can't find our way out of here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 看看我们能不能找到出去的路。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yeah, lets go. I can't wait to get out of this place.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，我们走吧。我等不及要离开这个地方了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisago_000073ef_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I just wanted to look you in the eye when you die. <Attack>
ESP.TRADUIT: 我只想在你死的时候看着你的眼睛。<攻击>

ESP.ORIGINAL: Well, alright. We seem to be safe for now. Ask away.
ESP.TRADUIT: 嗯，好吧。我们现在似乎安全了，问吧。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_000073f2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you think happened down here?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得下面发生了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not sure, but That scientist guy or whatever he was talked a lot about it. Most of the times though I couldn't really understand his ramblings.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不确定，但是那个科学家什么的说了很多。虽然大多数时候我不能真正理解他的胡言乱语。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: When it kind of seemed to make sense he'd say something that made me question whether any of what he'd said was true at all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当我觉得有道理的时候，他会说一些话，让我怀疑他说的是不是真的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But from what I've been able to piece together, he and someone named, I think it was 'Taylor' used to be part of the science team down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但从我所能拼凑的信息来看，他和一个叫泰勒的人曾经是这里科学小组的一员。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: It must've been years ago though, before it all went down.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但那一定是很多年前的事了，在事情发生之前。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm not exactly sure why, but I think that that other scientist made some kind of decision that caused all this.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不太确定为什么，但我认为其他科学家做了某种决定，导致了这一切。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_5.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: But what that decision was or what it entailed, I have no idea. He spoke highly of the guy though, I think they were close.
ESP.TRADUIT: 但我不知道那个决定是什么，它意味着什么。他对那家伙评价很高，我觉得他们很亲近。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Elisa [05004F10] (mod) Quest : ([050073E9]Vault76ElisaDialogue) Vault76ElisaDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76elisavoicetype\vault76eli_vault76elisaque_00002f6f_6.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: The name's Higgs. I'm a miner, or rather I was. Came from North vegas originally, but I much prefer the quiet down here.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我叫希格斯，我是一名矿工，或者说我曾经是一名矿工。我从北维加斯来的，但我更喜欢这里的安静。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgswho_000079c7_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You seem concerned? Anything I can do to help?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你看起来很担心？有什么我能帮忙的吗？

ESP.ORIGINAL: No, no it's... Wait, as a matter of fact you can! I was sent here by Tempeh over in Shamble, a small mining community out east, southwest of Nipton.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不，不，是...等等，其实你可以的！我是被丹贝派到乱麻镇来的，这是东部的一个小矿业社区，尼普顿西南方向。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgshel_000079c8_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I was supposed to try to get someone from the NCR to help us but...
ESP.TRADUIT: 我本应该找NCR的人来帮我们的，但是...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgshel_000079c8_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: That Ranger what's his name hasn't given me the time of day. Been waiting so long an I fear time's runnin out..
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个不知道叫什么名字的游骑兵，一整天都不理我。我等了这么久，我担心时间已经不多了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgshel_000079c8_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: If you could go to Shamble and see if you can help them out I would greatly appreciate it!
ESP.TRADUIT: 如果你能去乱麻镇看看你是否能帮助他们，我会非常感激的！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgshel_000079c8_4.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do they need help with?
That is a long story. Suffice to say that they're in urgent need of help. If you'd manage to help them out I'd be willing to give you... lets see...
ESP.TRADUIT: 这是一个很长的故事，我只想说他们急需帮助。如果你能设法帮助他们，我愿意给你...我看看...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgswha_000079c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: 50 caps? I don't have much to give so...
ESP.TRADUIT: 50瓶盖？我没什么可以给你的，所以...
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgswha_000079c9_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ah well, no I... Nevermind.. I'll just keep waiting, eventually the Ranger has to notice me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 啊好吧，不，我...算了...我就等着吧，总有一天游骑兵会注意到我的。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsno_000079ca_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Oh, you will? Thank you! As I said, Shamble is to the east of here, and southwest of Nipton. Let Peters know I sent you. Good luck!
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，你会吗？谢谢你！我说过，乱麻镇在这儿的东边，尼普顿的西南。告诉彼得斯是我派你来的，好运！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsyes_000079cb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I don't have time for this.
I understand. I will just keep checkin' in with the NCR. Thanks anyway. See you 'round.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我明白了，我会继续跟NCR联系的，不过还是谢谢你。回头见。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsnot_000079cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Keep your caps, you need them more than I do.
ESP.TRADUIT: 留着你的瓶盖吧，你比我更需要它们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I didn't know that people as kind as yourself still existed, thought them was long gone I did! But you pleasantly surprised me.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我不知道像你这样善良的人还存在，我以为他们早就不在了！但你给了我惊喜。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Surprise Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgskee_000079cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Here you are. And let me know if I can do anything else for you.
ESP.TRADUIT: 给你。如果还有什么需要我帮忙的，请告诉我。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgswel_000079d0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: [SUCCEEDED] Ah yes of course, that couldn't have been easy! Hm well alright, 100 caps it is.
ESP.TRADUIT: [成功]啊，是的，当然，这并不容易！嗯，好吧，100瓶盖。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsbar_000079c2_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Do you have any idea how much I had to go through? I think I deserve a little extra.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你知道我受了多少苦吗？我觉得我应该多拿一点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [FAILED] Now now, you shouldn't look a gift brahmin in the mouths. I will gladly give you the agreed 100 caps, but no need to be greedy.
ESP.TRADUIT: [失败]好了好了，你不该对婆罗门的礼物吹毛求疵。我很乐意给你约定的100瓶盖，但不要太贪婪。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsbar_000079c3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Maybe you could throw in a few extra caps? Pretty please?
ESP.TRADUIT: 也许你能多给我几个瓶盖？拜托了？

ESP.ORIGINAL: What are you going to do now?
I will pack up here an head back to Shamble. Then I'm not sure. Depends on what them others want to do I think.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我要在这里收拾行李，回乱麻镇去。然后我不确定，我认为这取决于其他人想做什么。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgswha_000079d1_1.ogg

NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsgoo_000079c0_1.ogg

NPC : Higgs [050016CF] (mod) Quest : ([050079B5]Vault76HiggsDialogue) Vault76HiggsDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76higgsvoicetype\vault76hig_vault76higgsgoo_000079c1_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You already forgot? Hehe, the name's Tempeh.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你已经忘了？呵呵，我叫丹贝。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1c7_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000dbee_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: What's your name, by the way?
ESP.TRADUIT: 顺便问一下，你叫什么名字？

ESP.ORIGINAL: Didn't I just tell you that?
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000dbf0_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Wait, what was your name again?

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000dbf3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: You're starting to piss me off.
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Anger Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1d5_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'm sorry. I forgot your name again.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我很抱歉，我又忘了你的名字。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehgo_0000e1c2_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehgo_0000e1c3_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehgo_0000e1d0_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Fear Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehat_0000dbfb_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Enough of this. Now you die. <Attack>
Oh, thank you so much! Here, take this key. It unlocks the door that leads deeper into the mine.
ESP.TRADUIT: 噢，非常感谢你！给，拿着这把钥匙。它能打开通往矿井深处的门。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Happy Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehqu_0000e1d3_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: And... if the worst has happened... just let me know, so I can inform their families.
ESP.TRADUIT: 还有...如果最坏的事情发生了...告诉我一声，我好通知他们的家人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehqu_0000e1d3_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: This here is Shamble. We're a small independent mining community. But with our recent problems, I'm not sure if we'll last.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这里是乱麻镇，我们是一个独立的小型采矿社区。但鉴于我们最近的问题，我不确定我们能不能维持下去。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1c9_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Yes, it's a shame. Even though most of the inhabitants were downright criminals, there were a lot of fine folk as well.
ESP.TRADUIT: 是的，很遗憾。虽然大多数居民都是犯罪分子，但也有很多好人。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Sad Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1cc_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Them Legion don't bother us though. Even though we're a small community, we produce enough iron to satisfy both the Legion and the NCR.
ESP.TRADUIT: 不过军团不会打扰我们。虽然我们是一个小社区，但我们生产的铁足以满足军团和NCR。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1cc_2.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: There is no shame in keeping healthy relations with your customer, whoever they might be. Bitin' hands that feed n' all.
ESP.TRADUIT: 无论你的客户是谁，保持良好的关系都不丢人。不要咬喂你吃饭的手。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1cc_3.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Haven't you noticed that Nipton is on fire?
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没注意到尼普顿着火了吗？

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1cd_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something else.

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1ce_1.ogg

NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehto_0000e1cf_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: I'd like to ask you something else.
Well, I guess we could ask the NCR, if they ever come... I guess with the war and all, a bunch of miners ain't that important.
ESP.TRADUIT: 好吧，我想我们可以问问NCR，如果他们来的话...我觉得在战争期间，一群矿工已经不那么重要了。
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: NPC : Tempeh [05000B76] (mod) Quest : ([05001CF0]Vault76TempehDialogue) Vault76TempehDialogue EmotionType : Neutral Audio (bsa): sound\voice\into the deep.esm\vault76tempehvoicetype\vault76tem_vault76tempehqu_0001423c_1.ogg

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sorry, I don't have time right now.
ESP.TRADUIT: 对不起，我现在没有时间。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Find some way to get Gabriel out of his cell.
ESP.TRADUIT: 想办法把加布里埃尔从牢房里救出来。
护送加布里埃尔到安全的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Tell Tempeh that Gabriel was already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]告诉丹贝加布里埃尔已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Tempeh that Gabriel is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉丹贝加布里埃尔已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Tempeh that Mathilda is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉丹贝玛蒂尔达已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Tell Tempeh that Clarence is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉丹贝克拉伦斯已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Gain access to the water treatment section of the vault through the reactor.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过反应堆进入避难所的水处理部分。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Repair the door to the laboratory.
Tell Tempeh that Elisa is dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: 告诉丹贝埃莉萨已经死了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Tell Tempeh that Elisa was already dead.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选]告诉丹贝，埃莉萨已经死了。
护送埃莉萨到安全的地方。

ESP.ORIGINAL: [Optional] Find new parts for the broken door.
ESP.TRADUIT: [可选] 给坏了的门找新的零件。
在26号避难所找一个灯泡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Replace the lightbulb in the library of Vault 26.
ESP.TRADUIT: 更换26号避难所图书馆的灯泡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: I have found a pristine lightbulb in Vault 26.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我在26号避难所找到了一个崭新的灯泡。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Robots with glass screens are no longer a match for you! In combat, you have +5% critical hit chance against Securitrons.
ESP.TRADUIT: 拥有玻璃屏幕的机器人再也不是你的对手了！在战斗中，你对电子保安造成的伤害增加5%。

ESP.ORIGINAL: With your newly extensively trained mind, after reading five magazines, you gain one permanent skill point in that respective skill.
ESP.TRADUIT: 用你最近广泛训练的头脑，在阅读了五本杂志后，你在相应技能中获得一个永久技能点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: All the motivating inscriptions that you've read has made you realize how to pick yourself up when life gets you down! Whenever your Health drops to 50% or below you do an additional 10% Critical Damage.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你读过的所有激励人心的铭文都让你意识到，当生活让你沮丧时，如何振作起来！当你的生命值下降到50%或以下时，你会额外造成10%的暴击伤害。

ESP.ORIGINAL: While Coco is a companion, you can carry an extra 25 lbs, and your "trader of the Mojave" aesthetic also provides you +10 Barter.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当可可是你的伙伴时，你可以多携带25磅的物品，你的“莫哈维商人”美学还给你提供了额外的10点交易技能。

ESP.COMMENTAIRE: Meshes : Vault76Meshes\Vault76rightglove.nif
Meshes : Vault76Meshes\Vault76leftglove.nif

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Due to the halt of excavation work in the mine, these explosives are being sold at-cost in bulk on behalf of Tempeh to recoup losses and pay for supplies. Prices are non-negotiable." Prices: Demolition Charges x20 - %.0f caps Powder Charges x30 - %.0f caps
ESP.TRADUIT:
“由于矿井的挖掘工作暂停，这些炸药以成本价成批出售，以弥补损失和支付供应费用。价格没有商量余地。”
价格: 炸药包 x20 - %.0f 瓶盖 火药 x30 - %.0f 瓶盖

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purchase Demolition Charges And Provide Equal Donation For Miner Supplies [Good Karma]
ESP.TRADUIT: 购买炸药包并为矿工提供同等捐赠[善业]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Purchase Powder Charges And Provide Equal Donation For Miner Supplies [Good Karma]
ESP.TRADUIT: 购买火药并为矿工提供同等捐赠[善业]

ESP.ORIGINAL: Sifting through the extensive research has given you a greater understanding of the weak points in the securitron design, granting you the perk 'Asimov's Avenger'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 通过广泛的研究筛选让你更了解电子保安设计上的弱点，让您的perk“阿西莫夫的复仇者”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Ouch! Maybe there's another way in?
ESP.TRADUIT: 哎哟！也许还有别的办法？

ESP.ORIGINAL: This looks like a cabinet used for storing various parts. However the particular door parts that you need are nowhere to be seen. Maybe there is another storage room in the other wing?
ESP.TRADUIT: 这看起来像一个用来储存各种零件的柜子。然而，你需要的特殊的门部件却不见了。也许在另一边还有一个储藏室？

ESP.ORIGINAL: An interesting read! You have gained the perk 'A Trained Mind'.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有趣的阅读！你已经获得了“大脑特训”的Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You need to clear the flooding first.

A quick examination of the door reveals that the external locking mechanism has been broken using a fire axe. The broken parts could be replaced, though a skilled mechanic might be able to repair it without them [Repair 70]. There may be a storage locker nearby with the necessary replacement parts.
ESP.TRADUIT: 快速检查了一下门，发现外部锁定机制已经被消防斧破坏了。斧头可以被移除，坏掉的部分可以被替换，尽管熟练的技工可以在没有替换部件的情况下修理它[修理70]。附近可能有一个储物柜，里面有必要的备件。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Fiddle around with the wires randomly.
There are large bitemarks and scratches all over this cabinet. It looks like an unusually big lakelurk might have mistaken the parts for food.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个柜子上到处都是很大的咬痕和抓痕。看起来一个异常大的湖沼蟹可能把这些部分误认为是食物。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somehow while jumbling around with the wires you managed to bypass the missing part and form the exact wire connection required to fix the door! Lucky you!
ESP.TRADUIT: 不知怎的，在混乱的电线周围，你设法绕过了缺失的部分，并形成了精确的电线连接到了需要修理的门！你真幸运！

ESP.ORIGINAL: I knew that was a good idea.
ESP.TRADUIT: 我就知道这是个好主意。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You easily shove aside the consoles as though they were light as a feather.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你可以轻松地推开操作台，仿佛它们轻如鸿毛。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Somebody has stacked these consoles, rendering passage difficult. Someone really strong might be able to move the consoles aside, or someone really nimble might be able to squeeze through.
ESP.TRADUIT: 有人把这些操作台堆了起来，使得通行变得困难。非常强壮的人或许能够将操作台移到一边，或者一些非常敏捷的人能够挤过去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Try to climb over the consoles. [Agility]
You nimbly managed to sqeeze yourself though the small opening.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你灵巧地从那个小洞口挤了进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The water has a distinctly metallic taste, and almost makes you feel more thirsty than you did before.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这水有一种明显的金属味，几乎让你感觉比之前更渴了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Your gums are in apin and you feel a slight burning sensation in your mouth and throat.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你的牙龈发软，嘴巴和喉咙有轻微的烧灼感。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You feel a tingling sensation in you arms, as if they are slowly becoming numb. There's a piercing pain in your stomach, and you feel like vomiting.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你觉得你的手臂有一种刺痛的感觉，好像它们正在慢慢变得麻木。你的胃传来一阵撕裂的痛，想吐。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the water fills your thoat and poisons every cell in your body, your head starts pounding as if about to explode. You immidiately puke up huge amounts of blood, and as your eyesight grows dimmer by the second, only one thought is in your head; What have I done?
ESP.TRADUIT: 当水充满你的喉咙，毒害你身体的每一个细胞时，你的头开始怦怦作响，好像要爆炸一样。你立刻吐出大量的血，随着你的视力逐渐变暗，只有一个想法在你的脑海中：我做了什么？

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the water fills your thoat and reaches every cell in your body, you feel your muscles tense up. You can see them visibly grow larger, and your veins are getting easier to see. But at the same time, as your body grows stronger, you feel you mental capabilities slip away. Your thoughts are getting more hazy, and you have more trouble putting together coherent thoughts. But at least you're not dead! Drinking even more would probably be a bad idea...
ESP.TRADUIT: 当水充满你的喉咙，到达你身体的每一个细胞时，你感到你的肌肉开始紧张。你可以看到它们明显地在变大，你的静脉也变得更清晰。但当你的身体变得更强壮时，你感到你的精神能力在溜走。你的思维变得越来越模糊，你很难将连贯的想法整合在一起。但至少你没死！再多喝恐怕也不是什么好主意...

ESP.ORIGINAL: This door can only be opened through the mainframe.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇门只能通过主机打开。

ESP.ORIGINAL: As the water fills your thoat and reaches every cell in your body, you feel your muscles tense up. You can see them visibly grow larger, and your veins are getting easier to see. You feel healthier than ever! But drinking even more of this water might be too much, even for your now enhanced body.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当水充满你的喉咙，到达你身体的每一个细胞时，你感到你的肌肉开始紧张。你可以看到它们明显地在变大，你的静脉也变得更清晰。你感觉比以往任何时候都更健康！但是，即使对你现在已经强化的身体来说，喝更多的这种水也可能太多了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: What do you want to say to Coco?
Tell her to return to Shamble.
Coco looks at you curiously. Maybe this animal would be interested in assisting you on your travels if she were to be bought.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可可好奇地看着你。如果她被买下来的话，也许这只动物会有兴趣在你的旅途中帮助你。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "It's essential to give your arguments impact."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“让你的论点产生影响是至关重要的。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "It's essential to give your arguments impact."
ESP.TRADUIT: "让你的论点产生影响是至关重要的。"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coco has now become addicted and is now much weaker than usual. Some Fixer might make her feel better.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可可已经上瘾了，现在比平时虚弱多了。来点瘾头解也许能让她好受点。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The cave seems to have collapsed when the giant lakelurk roared. It is impossible to get through this pile of rocks and sand without the use of some potent explosives.
ESP.TRADUIT: 当巨大的湖沼蟹咆哮时，洞穴似乎坍塌了。要穿过这堆石头和沙子不使用强力炸药是不可能的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Before you lies the lifeless corpse of Mathilda. Inform Tempeh of her unfortunate demise.
ESP.TRADUIT: 在你面前躺着的是玛蒂尔达的尸体。将她的不幸死亡告知丹贝。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Clarence is dead. There are drag marks leading up to his corpse, and you feel a chill crawling up your spine; someone wanted you to find him.
ESP.TRADUIT: 克拉伦斯已经死了。有拖拽的痕迹一直延伸到他的尸体，你感到一股寒意爬上了你的脊梁：有人想让你找到他。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The lock on this door is impossible to pick and will only open with an apartment key card. There is a name tag on the door: Abaddon Taylor
ESP.TRADUIT: 这扇门上的锁是撬不开的，只有用公寓密钥卡才能打开。门上有一个名牌: 亚巴顿·泰勒

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have placed the dynamite bundle on the giant pile of rocks. Get to a safe distance before it blows!
ESP.TRADUIT: 你把一捆炸药放在巨大的岩石堆上。在爆炸前躲到安全的地方！

ESP.ORIGINAL: Despite your efforts the incredible stress and pressure you feel from the knowledge that there is a terrible beast is still alive and so close to you makes arming the dynamite impossible.
ESP.TRADUIT: 尽管你付出了努力，但当你知道有一只可怕的野兽还活着，而且离你如此之近时，你会感到难以置信的压力和压力，这让你根本无法引爆炸药。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mad scientist has called for reinforcements! To stop them you need to use the mainframe in front of the bridge to keep the doors sealed.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个疯狂的科学家在呼叫增援！为了阻止他们，你需要使用舰桥前的主机来保持门的密封。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The mad scientist has yet again called for reinforcements! Use the mainframe under the bridge to stop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 那个疯狂的科学家再次呼叫增援！用桥下的主机阻止他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: One last wave of reinforcements are on their way! Hack the mainframe again to stop them.
ESP.TRADUIT: 最后一波援军正在赶来！再次黑进主机，阻止他们。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You have lost Coco's Beast of Burden perk.
Coco has given you the Beast of Burden perk.
ESP.TRADUIT: 可可给你带来了"驮兽"的Perk。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Coco has gone to the Lucky 38.
With his last remaining energy, the professor activates the entire dormant robotic army. This has lifted the total lockdown, but getting out might prove more difficult than getting in.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教授用他最后剩余的能量，激活了整个休眠的机器人军队。这已经解除了全面封锁，但出去可能比进来更难。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This seems to be the broken light that the Infotron was refering to. It would take a trivial amount of Repair skill to replace it if you have a replacement bulb.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这似乎就是信息创客说的那盏破灯。如果你有一个灯泡，你只需要一点点的修理技巧就可以把它换掉。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This body appears to have been violently decapitated.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这具尸体似乎是被暴力斩首的。

ESP.ORIGINAL: This light fixture's bulb appears to be burnt out.
ESP.TRADUIT: 这个灯具的灯泡好像烧坏了。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the caps to purchase the demolition charges at the listed price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有按标价购买炸药包的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You swipe the apartment key card and unlock the door.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你刷了一下公寓密钥卡，然后打开了门。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
Well done! You've found all of Vault 26's Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobbleheads!
Return them all to the Bobblehead Collector's Stand in the Atrium to claim your reward!
ESP.TRADUIT:
干得好！你已经找到了26号避难所所有的避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
把它们全部归还到中庭的摇头娃娃收藏者展台领取你的奖励！

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Never be afraid to dodge the sensitive issues."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“永远不要害怕回避敏感问题。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: "Never be afraid to dodge the sensitive issues."
ESP.TRADUIT: “永远不要害怕回避敏感问题。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Never forget to walk away with more than you've brought."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“永远不要忘记带着比你带来的更多的东西离开。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "The best way to win an argument is to be the loudest."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“赢得争论的最好方法就是声音最大。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Nothing says pizzazz like a winning smile."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“没有什么比胜利的微笑更能体现活力的了。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Always be ready to take one for the team."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“时刻准备着为团队牺牲。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Arrive at peaceful resolutions by using superior firepower."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“利用优势火力达成和平解决方案。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "The best way to solve a problem is to make it go away."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“解决问题的最好方法就是让它消失。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "It takes the smartest individuals to realize there's always more to learn."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“只有最聪明的人才会意识到，总有更多的东西需要学习。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Always strive for the unobtainable."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“永远为无法获得的东西而奋斗。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You completed the Bobble Hunt Challenge!
Your diligence has rewarded you with the perk Bobble Trouble.
ESP.TRADUIT:
你完成了摇头狩猎挑战！
你的勤奋为你带来了额外特技“摇头故障”。

ESP.ORIGINAL: The Professor seems determined. If you choose to enter his laboratory you might not be able to turn back the way you came.
ESP.TRADUIT: 教授似乎下定了决心。如果你选择进入他的实验室，你可能无法从原路返回。

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "There's only one way to give 110%%."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“只有一种方法可以做到110%%的付出。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "The smart man knows a bandage only hides his wounds."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“聪明人知道绷带只能掩盖伤口。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "It's important to do business up close and personal."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“谈私人生意最重要的是近距离。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Only through observation will you perceive weakness."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“只有通过观察，你才能察觉到弱点。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Why go down with the ship when you can try to fix it?"
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“既然你能修好船，为什么还要跟船一起沉没呢？”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Always be prepared to explain the hows and the whys."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“总是准备好解释怎么和为什么。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Because it's easier to have courage from a safe distance away."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“因为在安全距离之外更容易获得勇气。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "The safest distance between two points is a shadowy line."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“两点之间最安全的距离是一条模糊的线。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "Let your words be your weapon."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“让你的语言成为你的武器。”

ESP.ORIGINAL:
You've found a Vault-Tec Limited Edition Bobblehead!
The inscription on the base reads "When words fail, there's always fists."
ESP.TRADUIT:
你找到了一个避难所科技限量版摇头娃娃！
底座上的铭文写道：“当言语失败时，总会有拳头。”

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the caps to purchase the demolition charges at the listed price and provide an equal donation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有足够的瓶盖以标价购买炸药包并提供等额的捐款。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You should try to enter through the main entrance.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你应该设法从正门进去。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the caps to purchase the powder charges at the listed price.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有按标价购买火药的瓶盖。

ESP.ORIGINAL: You lack the caps to purchase the powder charges at the listed price and provide an equal donation.
ESP.TRADUIT: 你没有足够的瓶盖以标价购买火药并提供等额的捐款。

ESP.ORIGINAL: Place all the collected Bobbleheads on the Bobblehead Collector's Stand in the Atrium of Vault 26.
ESP.TRADUIT: 将收集到的所有摇头娃娃放在26号避难所中庭的摇头娃娃收藏架上。
找到26号避难所的全部20个摇头娃娃。
